89 billion tokens. Our evaluation leverages both established general benchmarks
and a novel, healthcare-specific methodology, offering crucial insights to
support fairness and safety in clinical AI applications.

</details>


### [150] [Large language models for folktale type automation based on motifs: Cinderella case study](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18561)
*Tjaša Arčon,Marko Robnik-Šikonja,Polona Tratnik*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 使用机器学习和自然语言处理技术，我们能够自动识别童话故事中的母题，并分析它们之间的相似性和差异性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 将人工智能方法应用于数字人文研究领域，特别是民俗学的大规模分析。

Method: 利用机器学习和自然语言处理技术，对大量的“灰姑娘”变体故事进行母题的自动检测，并结合聚类和降维技术分析其异同。

Result: 大型语言模型能够识别故事中复杂的交互作用，使得对大量文本集合进行计算分析以及跨语言比较成为可能。

Conclusion: 人工智能方法，特别是大型语言模型，为民俗学研究提供了强大的工具，能够实现大规模、跨语言的文本分析。

Abstract: Artificial intelligence approaches are being adapted to many research areas,
including digital humanities. We built a methodology for large-scale analyses
in folkloristics. Using machine learning and natural language processing, we
automatically detected motifs in a large collection of Cinderella variants and
analysed their similarities and differences with clustering and dimensionality
reduction. The results show that large language models detect complex
interactions in tales, enabling computational analysis of extensive text
collections and facilitating cross-lingual comparisons.

</details>


### [151] [Beyond the Explicit: A Bilingual Dataset for Dehumanization Detection in Social Media](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18582)
*Dennis Assenmacher,Paloma Piot,Katarina Laken,David Jurgens,Claudia Wagner*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一个包含16,000个标注实例的双语数据集，用于识别和分析数字人类的非人化现象，解决了现有研究仅关注明显负面言论的局限性，并通过微调机器学习模型证明了该数据集的有效性，在零样本和少样本的上下文设置中取得了超越最先进水平的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有研究主要关注明显负面的非人化言论，忽略了更微妙但同样有害的偏见形式，尤其是在数字交流中。因此，有必要创建一个更全面的数据集来识别和解决这些微妙形式的非人化。

Method: 研究人员收集了一个理论知情的双语数据集，其中包含从Twitter和Reddit收集的16,000个标注实例。该数据集在文档和跨度级别进行标注，并涵盖了非人化的不同维度。此外，研究人员还微调了机器学习模型，以在零样本和少样本的上下文设置中评估该数据集的有效性。

Result: 通过在所提出的双语数据集上微调机器学习模型，研究人员在零样本和少样本的上下文设置中取得了超越最先进水平的性能，证明了该数据集在检测非人化方面的有效性。

Conclusion: 本研究提出了一个全面的双语数据集，用于识别数字交流中的非人化现象，解决了现有研究的局限性。该数据集可用于训练机器学习模型，并为评估未来的非人化检测技术提供基准。微调模型的结果表明，该数据集在提高非人化检测的准确性方面具有潜力。

Abstract: Digital dehumanization, although a critical issue, remains largely overlooked
within the field of computational linguistics and Natural Language Processing.
The prevailing approach in current research concentrating primarily on a single
aspect of dehumanization that identifies overtly negative statements as its
core marker. This focus, while crucial for understanding harmful online
communications, inadequately addresses the broader spectrum of dehumanization.
Specifically, it overlooks the subtler forms of dehumanization that, despite
not being overtly offensive, still perpetuate harmful biases against
marginalized groups in online interactions. These subtler forms can insidiously
reinforce negative stereotypes and biases without explicit offensiveness,
making them harder to detect yet equally damaging. Recognizing this gap, we use
different sampling methods to collect a theory-informed bilingual dataset from
Twitter and Reddit. Using crowdworkers and experts to annotate 16,000 instances
on a document- and span-level, we show that our dataset covers the different
dimensions of dehumanization. This dataset serves as both a training resource
for machine learning models and a benchmark for evaluating future
dehumanization detection techniques. To demonstrate its effectiveness, we
fine-tune ML models on this dataset, achieving performance that surpasses
state-of-the-art models in zero and few-shot in-context settings.

</details>


### [152] [Dynamical model parameters from ultrasound tongue kinematics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18629)
*Sam Kirkham,Patrycja Strycharczuk*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: ultrasound imaging can be used to evaluate dynamical articulatory models, yielding comparable results to traditional EMA methods.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: evaluating ultrasound imaging as an alternative to EMA for data collection in speech control models, specifically focusing on dynamical systems.

Method: comparing dynamical system parameters (linear harmonic oscillator) estimated from ultrasound tongue kinematics with those estimated from simultaneously-recorded EMA data. Jaw motion was also assessed using mandibular short tendon tracking.

Result: ultrasound and EMA yielded comparable dynamical parameters. Mandibular short tendon tracking also adequately captured jaw motion.

Conclusion: ultrasound kinematics are a viable and comparable alternative to EMA for evaluating dynamical articulatory models.

Abstract: The control of speech can be modelled as a dynamical system in which
articulators are driven toward target positions. These models are typically
evaluated using fleshpoint data, such as electromagnetic articulography (EMA),
but recent methodological advances make ultrasound imaging a promising
alternative. We evaluate whether the parameters of a linear harmonic oscillator
can be reliably estimated from ultrasound tongue kinematics and compare these
with parameters estimated from simultaneously-recorded EMA data. We find that
ultrasound and EMA yield comparable dynamical parameters, while mandibular
short tendon tracking also adequately captures jaw motion. This supports using
ultrasound kinematics to evaluate dynamical articulatory models.

</details>


### [153] [MLMA: Towards Multilingual with Mamba Based Architectures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18684)
*Mohamed Nabih Ali,Daniele Falavigna,Alessio Brutti*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: MLMA是一种利用Mamba架构进行多语言语音识别的新方法，在保持高资源和低资源语言之间性能平衡的同时，展现出与Transformer相当的性能，并具有更好的可扩展性和效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的多语言自动语音识别（ASR）系统在处理高资源和低资源语言时存在性能不平衡的挑战，而Transformer等序列模型在可扩展性和效率方面也存在局限性。

Method: 提出MLMA（Multilingual Language Modeling with Mamba for ASR）方法，利用Mamba架构（一种优化的、用于长上下文序列处理的、高效的状态空间模型）进行多语言ASR。MLMA隐式地结合了语言感知条件和共享表示，以支持跨不同语言的鲁棒识别。

Result: 在标准多语言基准测试中，MLMA取得了与基于Transformer的架构相当的性能。

Conclusion: Mamba架构有潜力成为可扩展、高效且准确的多语言语音识别的强大骨干。

Abstract: Multilingual automatic speech recognition (ASR) remains a challenging task,
especially when balancing performance across high- and low-resource languages.
Recent advances in sequence modeling suggest that architectures beyond
Transformers may offer better scalability and efficiency. In this work, we
introduce MLMA (Multilingual Language Modeling with Mamba for ASR), a new
approach that leverages the Mamba architecture -- an efficient state-space
model optimized for long-context sequence processing -- for multilingual ASR.
Using Mamba, MLMA implicitly incorporates language-aware conditioning and
shared representations to support robust recognition across diverse languages.
Experiments on standard multilingual benchmarks show that MLMA achieves
competitive performance compared to Transformer-based architectures. These
results highlight Mamba's potential as a strong backbone for scalable,
efficient, and accurate multilingual speech recognition.

</details>


### [154] [Investigating LLM Capabilities on Long Context Comprehension for Medical Question Answering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18691)
*Feras AlMannaa,Talia Tseriotou,Jenny Chim,Maria Liakata*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 本研究首次调查了LLM在长文本（LC）临床相关医学问答中的理解能力，评估了不同内容包含设置、模型能力和数据集，并研究了检索增强生成（RAG）对医学LC理解的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究旨在首次调查LLM在长文本（LC）医学问答中的理解能力，重点关注临床相关性，并评估RAG等技术的影响。

Method: 通过评估不同内容包含设置、模型能力和数据集，并研究RAG对医学LC理解的影响，采用多方面的方法进行定性和错误分析。

Result: 研究揭示了模型大小效应、局限性、潜在的记忆问题以及推理模型的优势，并找到了RAG的最佳设置，以及常见的失败案例。

Conclusion: RAG在特定设置下对LLM在长文本医学问答中的理解能力有益，但需要仔细选择设置以克服其局限性。

Abstract: This study is the first to investigate LLM comprehension capabilities over
long-context (LC) medical QA of clinical relevance. Our comprehensive
assessment spans a range of content-inclusion settings based on their
relevance, LLM models of varying capabilities and datasets across task
formulations, revealing insights on model size effects, limitations, underlying
memorization issues and the benefits of reasoning models. Importantly, we
examine the effect of RAG on medical LC comprehension, uncover best settings in
single versus multi-document reasoning datasets and showcase RAG strategies for
improvements over LC. We shed light into some of the evaluation aspects using a
multi-faceted approach. Our qualitative and error analyses address open
questions on when RAG is beneficial over LC, revealing common failure cases.

</details>


### [155] [Bayesian Low-Rank Factorization for Robust Model Adaptation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18723)
*Enes Yavuz Ugan,Ngoc-Quan Pham,Alexander Waibel*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 通过贝叶斯因子化适配器解决语音基础模型在处理本地化需求（如语种转换）时可能存在的过拟合和灾难性遗忘问题，并在Whisper模型上进行了验证，结果表明该方法在适应特定领域的同时能有效保留通用能力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大型语音基础模型在多领域表现优异，但需要适配以处理如语种转换等本地化需求，而直接微调存在过拟合和遗忘基础模型通用能力的风险。

Method: 提出使用贝叶斯因子化适配器，通过将先验置于接近零的位置来实现更稀疏的适配矩阵，从而在适配特定领域的同时保留通用性能。将此方法应用于Whisper模型，并在多语言语种转换场景下进行评估。

Result: 与LoRA相比，所提出的方法在保持新领域仅4%性能下降的情况下，实现了54%的向后增益（灾难性遗忘减少），表明其在适应性任务中仅有微小的性能损失。

Conclusion: 贝叶斯适配方法能够有效地对语音基础模型进行微调，而不会牺牲其泛化能力，解决了在处理语种转换等本地化需求时可能出现的过拟合和灾难性遗忘问题。

Abstract: Large speech foundation models achieve strong performance across many
domains, but they often require adaptation to handle local needs such as
code-switching, where speakers mix languages within the same utterance. Direct
fine-tuning of these models risks overfitting to the target domain and
overwriting the broad capabilities of the base model. To address this
challenge, we explore Bayesian factorized adapters for speech foundation
models, which place priors near zero to achieve sparser adaptation matrices and
thereby retain general performance while adapting to specific domains. We apply
our approach to the Whisper model and evaluate on different multilingual
code-switching scenarios. Our results show only minimal adaptation loss while
significantly reducing catastrophic forgetting of the base model. Compared to
LoRA, our method achieves a backward gain of 54% with only a 4% drop on the new
domain. These findings highlight the effectiveness of Bayesian adaptation for
fine-tuning speech foundation models without sacrificing generalization.

</details>


### [156] [Adapting Language Balance in Code-Switching Speech](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18724)
*Enes Yavuz Ugan,Ngoc-Quan Pham,Alexander Waibel*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 大型基础模型在代码转换测试用例方面表现不佳，可能由于代码转换点不常出现，需要提供标签进行训练。通过利用嵌入语言和主语言之间的差异来突出代码转换点，可以减轻上下文偏差并提高模型的鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 由于代码转换点不常出现，导致模型在代码转换测试用例方面表现不佳，需要提供标签进行训练。

Method: 利用嵌入语言和主语言之间的差异来突出代码转换点，从而在这些位置强调学习。

Result: 在阿拉伯语和中英语实验中，模型能够更正确地预测转换点，代换错误减少。

Conclusion: 通过利用嵌入语言和主语言之间的差异来突出代码转换点，可以减轻上下文偏差，从而提高模型的鲁棒性。

Abstract: Despite achieving impressive results on standard benchmarks, large
foundational models still struggle against code-switching test cases. When data
scarcity cannot be used as the usual justification for poor performance, the
reason may lie in the infrequent occurrence of code-switched moments, where the
embedding of the second language appears subtly. Instead of expecting the
models to learn this infrequency on their own, it might be beneficial to
provide the training process with labels. Evaluating model performance on
code-switching data requires careful localization of code-switching points
where recognition errors are most consequential, so that the analysis
emphasizes mistakes occurring at those moments. Building on this observation,
we leverage the difference between the embedded and the main language to
highlight those code-switching points and thereby emphasize learning at those
locations. This simple yet effective differentiable surrogate mitigates context
bias during generation -- the central challenge in code-switching -- thereby
improving the model's robustness. Our experiments with Arabic and
Chinese-English showed that the models are able to predict the switching places
more correctly, reflected by the reduced substitution error.

</details>


### [157] [SemiAdapt and SemiLoRA: Efficient Domain Adaptation for Transformer-based Low-Resource Language Translation with a Case Study on Irish](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18725)
*Josh McGiff,Nikola S. Nikolov*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: PEFT方法（如LoRA）通过训练模型参数的一部分来降低微调大型语言模型的计算成本，使其更容易用于低资源领域，如爱尔兰语翻译。本文提出的SemiAdapt和SemiLoRA是半监督方法，能够提高模型在特定领域的适应性，并提升整体性能，其中SemiLoRA甚至可以媲美或超越全模型微调的效果。该研究还发现基于嵌入的推理方法在处理大规模、嘈杂语料库时表现尤为出色，并将所有模型作为开放资源发布，旨在促进低资源语言的研究。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 微调大型语言模型（如NMT）在计算上成本高昂，尤其是在低资源领域，这限制了相关研究。因此，需要更高效的微调方法。

Method: 提出SemiAdapt和SemiLoRA两种半监督、推理高效的方法，并结合LoRA（一种参数高效微调技术），用于加强领域适应性。此外，还评估了基于数据集的微调以及基于嵌入的推理方法。

Result: SemiAdapt的性能优于全领域微调；SemiLoRA的性能可以媲美甚至超越全模型微调；基于嵌入的推理方法在处理大规模、嘈杂语料库时表现良好。

Conclusion: SemiAdapt和SemiLoRA等半监督PEFT方法可以有效降低微调成本，提高低资源语言（如爱尔兰语）的NMT性能，使高质量的领域适应和微调更容易被研究者使用。

Abstract: Fine-tuning is widely used to tailor large language models for specific tasks
such as neural machine translation (NMT). However, leveraging transfer learning
is computationally expensive when fine-tuning large multilingual models with
billions of parameters, thus creating a barrier to entry for researchers
working on low-resource domains such as Irish translation. Parameter-efficient
fine-tuning (PEFT) bridges this gap by training on a fraction of the original
model parameters, with the Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) approach introducing
small, trainable adapter layers. We introduce SemiAdapt and SemiLoRA as
semi-supervised inference-efficient approaches that strengthen domain
adaptation and lead to improved overall performance in NMT. We demonstrate that
SemiAdapt can outperform full-domain fine-tuning, while most notably, SemiLoRA
can propel PEFT methods to match or even outperform full-model fine-tuning. We
further evaluate domain-by-dataset fine-tuning and demonstrate that our
embedding-based inference methods perform especially well on larger and noisier
corpora. All Irish translation models developed in this work are released as
open resources. These methods aim to make high-quality domain adaptation and
fine-tuning more accessible to researchers working with low-resource languages.

</details>


### [158] [Verifiable Accuracy and Abstention Rewards in Curriculum RL to Alleviate Lost-in-Conversation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18731)
*Ming Li*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 大型语言模型在多轮对话中存在“对话迷失”问题，表现为性能下降。为解决此问题，提出了一种名为RLAAR的课程强化学习框架，该框架通过可验证的准确性和弃权奖励，鼓励模型不仅生成正确答案，还能判断问题在多轮对话中的可解性。该方法采用能力门控课程，逐步增加对话难度，稳定训练并提高可靠性。通过多轮、on-policy rollout和混合奖励系统，RLAAR教会模型平衡问题解决与明智弃权，减少导致“对话迷失”的过早回答行为。在“对话迷失”基准测试中，RLAAR显著减轻了性能衰减（62.6%至75.1%），并提高了校准弃权率（33.5%至73.4%），为构建可靠、可信的多轮大型语言模型提供了实用方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大型语言模型在多轮对话中存在“对话迷失”（Lost-in-Conversation, LiC）问题，即随着信息的逐步揭示，模型性能会下降。

Method: 提出了一种名为RLAAR（Curriculum Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable Accuracy and Abstention Rewards）的框架，采用能力门控课程，逐步增加对话难度，并结合混合奖励系统（可验证准确性和弃权奖励），训练模型在解决问题的同时进行明智的弃权。

Result: 在“对话迷失”基准测试中，RLAAR显著减轻了性能衰减（从62.6%提升至75.1%），并提高了校准弃权率（从33.5%提升至73.4%）。

Conclusion: RLAAR框架能够有效缓解大型语言模型在多轮对话中的“对话迷失”问题，提高模型的可靠性和可信度。

Abstract: Large Language Models demonstrate strong capabilities in single-turn
instruction following but suffer from Lost-in-Conversation (LiC), a degradation
in performance as information is revealed progressively in multi-turn settings.
Motivated by the current progress on Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable
Rewards (RLVR), we propose Curriculum Reinforcement Learning with Verifiable
Accuracy and Abstention Rewards (RLAAR), a framework that encourages models not
only to generate correct answers, but also to judge the solvability of
questions in the multi-turn conversation setting. Our approach employs a
competence-gated curriculum that incrementally increases dialogue difficulty
(in terms of instruction shards), stabilizing training while promoting
reliability. Using multi-turn, on-policy rollouts and a mixed-reward system,
RLAAR teaches models to balance problem-solving with informed abstention,
reducing premature answering behaviors that cause LiC. Evaluated on LiC
benchmarks, RLAAR significantly mitigates LiC performance decay (62.6% to
75.1%) and improves calibrated abstention rates (33.5% to 73.4%). Together,
these results provide a practical recipe for building multi-turn reliable and
trustworthy LLMs.

</details>


### [159] [Topoformer: brain-like topographic organization in Transformer language models through spatial querying and reweighting](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18745)
*Taha Binhuraib,Greta Tuckute,Nicholas Blauch*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: Transformer模型加入空间拓扑结构，提升可解释性并模拟人脑语言网络。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有机器学习模型（尤其是Transformer）在表示上缺乏空间偏置，导致其表示难以可视化和解释，与生物大脑的多尺度空间组织形成对比。

Method: 提出一种新的自注意力机制，将Transformer转变为“Topoformers”。引入空间查询（keys和queries在2D网格上排列，查询的局部池与给定key相关联）和空间重加权（将标准的完全连接自注意力层转换为局部连接层）。

Result: 在一层Topoformer模型上进行情感分类任务训练，实现了查询和键的拓扑组织，以及值和自注意力输出的拓扑组织。将Topoformer结构扩展到BERT模型，在自然语言处理基准测试中表现与非拓扑模型相当，并产生了可通过八种语言测试套件评估的可解释的拓扑组织。此外，Topoformer模型中的低维拓扑变异性与人脑对自然句子的fMRI响应在语言网络上表现出一致性。

Conclusion: Topoformers通过引入空间偏置，在保持性能的同时显著提高了Transformer模型的可解释性，并能模拟人脑的语言信息组织方式，为NLP研究和人脑模型提供了新的方向。

Abstract: Spatial functional organization is a hallmark of biological brains: neurons
are arranged topographically according to their response properties, at
multiple scales. In contrast, representations within most machine learning
models lack spatial biases, instead manifesting as disorganized vector spaces
that are difficult to visualize and interpret. Here, we propose a novel form of
self-attention that turns Transformers into "Topoformers" with topographic
organization. We introduce spatial querying - where keys and queries are
arranged on 2D grids, and local pools of queries are associated with a given
key - and spatial reweighting, where we convert the standard fully connected
layer of self-attention into a locally connected layer. We first demonstrate
the feasibility of our approach by training a 1-layer Topoformer on a sentiment
classification task. Training with spatial querying encourages topographic
organization in the queries and keys, and spatial reweighting separately
encourages topographic organization in the values and self-attention outputs.
We then apply the Topoformer motifs at scale, training a BERT architecture with
a masked language modeling objective. We find that the topographic variant
performs on par with a non-topographic control model on NLP benchmarks, yet
produces interpretable topographic organization as evaluated via eight
linguistic test suites. Finally, analyzing an fMRI dataset of human brain
responses to a large set of naturalistic sentences, we demonstrate alignment
between low-dimensional topographic variability in the Topoformer model and
human brain language network. Scaling up Topoformers further holds promise for
greater interpretability in NLP research, and for more accurate models of the
organization of linguistic information in the human brain.

</details>


### [160] [AI use in American newspapers is widespread, uneven, and rarely disclosed](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18774)
*Jenna Russell,Marzena Karpinska,Destiny Akinode,Katherine Thai,Bradley Emi,Max Spero,Mohit Iyyer*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 大约9%的新闻文章部分或全部由AI生成，主要集中在小型地方媒体、特定主题（如天气、科技）和某些所有权集团。观点文章包含AI生成内容的可能性是新闻文章的6.4倍，但AI使用很少被披露。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: AI正在快速改变新闻业，但其在已发布的报纸文章中的使用程度尚不清楚。

Method: 审计一个包含2025年夏季发布的1.5K家美国报纸在线版186K篇文章的大型数据集，并使用AI检测器Pangram进行分析。此外，还分析了《华盛顿邮报》、《纽约时报》和《华尔街日报》的45K篇观点文章，并手动审计了100篇被标记为AI生成的文章。

Result: 约9%的文章部分或完全由AI生成，主要集中在小型地方媒体、天气和科技等主题以及某些所有权集团。观点文章中AI生成内容的比例比新闻文章高6.4倍。在手动审计的100篇被标记的文章中，只有5篇披露了AI的使用。

Conclusion: AI在新闻业中的使用需要更大的透明度，并且需要更新编辑标准，以维护公众信任。

Abstract: AI is rapidly transforming journalism, but the extent of its use in published
newspaper articles remains unclear. We address this gap by auditing a
large-scale dataset of 186K articles from online editions of 1.5K American
newspapers published in the summer of 2025. Using Pangram, a state-of-the-art
AI detector, we discover that approximately 9% of newly-published articles are
either partially or fully AI-generated. This AI use is unevenly distributed,
appearing more frequently in smaller, local outlets, in specific topics such as
weather and technology, and within certain ownership groups. We also analyze
45K opinion pieces from Washington Post, New York Times, and Wall Street
Journal, finding that they are 6.4 times more likely to contain AI-generated
content than news articles from the same publications, with many AI-flagged
op-eds authored by prominent public figures. Despite this prevalence, we find
that AI use is rarely disclosed: a manual audit of 100 AI-flagged articles
found only five disclosures of AI use. Overall, our audit highlights the
immediate need for greater transparency and updated editorial standards
regarding the use of AI in journalism to maintain public trust.

</details>


### [161] [KAT-Coder Technical Report](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18779)
*Zizheng Zhan,Ken Deng,Xiaojiang Zhang,Jinghui Wang,Huaixi Tang,Zhiyi Lai,Haoyang Huang,Wen Xiang,Kun Wu,Wenhao Zhuang,Minglei Zhang,Shaojie Wang,Shangpeng Yan,Kepeng Lei,Zongxian Feng,Huiming Wang,Zheng Lin,Mengtong Li,Mengfei Xie,Yinghan Cui,Xuxing Chen,Chao Wang,Weihao Li,Wenqiang Zhu,Jiarong Zhang,Jingxuan Xu,Songwei Yu,Yifan Yao,Xinping Lei,Han Li,Junqi Xiong,Zuchen Gao,Dailin Li,Haimo Li,Jiaheng Liu,Yuqun Zhang,Junyi Peng,Haotian Zhang,Bin Chen*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: KAT-Coder是一个大规模代码模型，通过多阶段课程进行训练，以弥合静态文本训练和动态现实世界执行之间的差距，并在软件开发工作流程中实现自主推理、规划和行动。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 弥合大型语言模型在静态文本训练和动态现实世界执行之间的差距，以实现自主的智能编码代理。

Method: KAT-Coder采用多阶段课程进行训练：中期训练（使用真实软件工程数据和合成代理交互）、监督微调（SFT）（构建包含多种编程语言、开发上下文和任务类型的百万样本数据集）、强化微调（RFT）（引入多重真实奖励公式以实现稳定且样本高效的策略优化），以及强化到部署适应（使用错误掩蔽SFT和树状轨迹训练适应生产级IDE环境）。

Result: KAT-Coder在工具使用可靠性、指令对齐和长上下文推理方面表现稳健，为现实世界的智能编码代理奠定了可部署的基础。KAT系列32B模型KAT-Dev已开源。

Conclusion: 通过多阶段课程训练，KAT-Coder能够实现强大的代码生成能力，并能可靠地应用于真实的软件开发环境，为未来的智能编码代理奠定了基础。

Abstract: Recent advances in large language models (LLMs) have enabled progress in
agentic coding, where models autonomously reason, plan, and act within
interactive software development workflows. However, bridging the gap between
static text-based training and dynamic real-world agentic execution remains a
core challenge. In this technical report, we present KAT-Coder, a large-scale
agentic code model trained through a multi-stage curriculum encompassing
Mid-Term Training, Supervised Fine-Tuning (SFT), Reinforcement Fine-Tuning
(RFT), and Reinforcement-to-Deployment Adaptation. The Mid-Term stage enhances
reasoning, planning, and reflection capabilities through a corpus of real
software engineering data and synthetic agentic interactions. The SFT stage
constructs a million-sample dataset balancing twenty programming languages, ten
development contexts, and ten task archetypes. The RFT stage introduces a novel
multi-ground-truth reward formulation for stable and sample-efficient policy
optimization. Finally, the Reinforcement-to-Deployment phase adapts the model
to production-grade IDE environments using Error-Masked SFT and Tree-Structured
Trajectory Training. In summary, these stages enable KAT-Coder to achieve
robust tool-use reliability, instruction alignment, and long-context reasoning,
forming a deployable foundation for real-world intelligent coding agents. Our
KAT series 32B model, KAT-Dev, has been open-sourced on
https://huggingface.co/Kwaipilot/KAT-Dev.

</details>


### [162] [WebSeer: Training Deeper Search Agents through Reinforcement Learning with Self-Reflection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18798)
*Guanzhong He,Zhen Yang,Jinxin Liu,Bin Xu,Lei Hou,Juanzi Li*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: WebSeer是一个利用强化学习和自我反思机制的智能搜索代理，它通过扩展工具使用链和提高回答准确性，在HotpotQA和SimpleQA等基准测试中取得了最先进的成果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的搜索代理在处理多轮交互式检索时，工具使用深度有限且容易累积错误，需要更智能的搜索代理。

Method: 提出了一种名为WebSeer的智能搜索代理，它采用强化学习并增强了自我反思机制。通过构建包含反思模式的大型数据集，并设计了一个两阶段的训练框架，将冷启动和强化学习统一在自我反思范式中，以实现在真实网络环境中生成更长、更具反思性的工具使用轨迹。

Result: WebSeer通过扩展工具使用链和提高回答准确性，在HotpotQA和SimpleQA上达到了72.3%和90.0%的准确率，并展现了对分布外数据集的强大泛化能力。

Conclusion: WebSeer通过自我反思机制显著提高了搜索代理在多轮交互中的性能，在关键问答任务上取得了最先进的成果，并验证了其泛化能力。

Abstract: Search agents have achieved significant advancements in enabling intelligent
information retrieval and decision-making within interactive environments.
Although reinforcement learning has been employed to train agentic models
capable of more dynamic interactive retrieval, existing methods are limited by
shallow tool-use depth and the accumulation of errors over multiple iterative
interactions. In this paper, we present WebSeer, a more intelligent search
agent trained via reinforcement learning enhanced with a self-reflection
mechanism. Specifically, we construct a large dataset annotated with reflection
patterns and design a two-stage training framework that unifies cold start and
reinforcement learning within the self-reflection paradigm for real-world
web-based environments, which enables the model to generate longer and more
reflective tool-use trajectories. Our approach substantially extends tool-use
chains and improves answer accuracy. Using a single 14B model, we achieve
state-of-the-art results on HotpotQA and SimpleQA, with accuracies of 72.3% and
90.0%, respectively, and demonstrate strong generalization to
out-of-distribution datasets. The code is available at
https://github.com/99hgz/WebSeer

</details>


### [163] [Fine-Tuned Thoughts: Leveraging Chain-of-Thought Reasoning for Industrial Asset Health Monitoring](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18817)
*Shuxin Lin,Dhaval Patel,Christodoulos Constantinides*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种知识蒸馏框架，将大语言模型（LLMs）的推理能力通过思维链（CoT）蒸馏到小型语言模型（SLMs）中，用于工业资产健康管理。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在工业等专业领域，虽然小型语言模型（SLMs）因其效率和低计算需求而受欢迎，但在进行复杂推理方面仍面临挑战，尤其是在工业4.0等领域。

Method: 提出了一种知识蒸馏框架，利用多项选择问答（MCQA）提示从LLMs中蒸馏CoT推理能力到SLMs。通过上下文学习验证生成知识的质量，并对微调后的SLMs与LLMs的性能进行基准测试。

Result: 微调后的SLMs在CoT推理方面表现显著优于基础模型，并缩小了与LLMs的性能差距。

Conclusion: 所提出的知识蒸馏框架能够有效地将LLMs的推理能力转移到SLMs中，提高了SLMs在工业资产健康管理等领域的推理和决策能力。

Abstract: Small Language Models (SLMs) are becoming increasingly popular in specialized
fields, such as industrial applications, due to their efficiency, lower
computational requirements, and ability to be fine-tuned for domain-specific
tasks, enabling accurate and cost-effective solutions. However, performing
complex reasoning using SLMs in specialized fields such as Industry 4.0 remains
challenging. In this paper, we propose a knowledge distillation framework for
industrial asset health, which transfers reasoning capabilities via
Chain-of-Thought (CoT) distillation from Large Language Models (LLMs) to
smaller, more efficient models (SLMs). We discuss the advantages and the
process of distilling LLMs using multi-choice question answering (MCQA) prompts
to enhance reasoning and refine decision-making. We also perform in-context
learning to verify the quality of the generated knowledge and benchmark the
performance of fine-tuned SLMs with generated knowledge against widely used
LLMs. The results show that the fine-tuned SLMs with CoT reasoning outperform
the base models by a significant margin, narrowing the gap to their LLM
counterparts. Our code is open-sourced at:
https://github.com/IBM/FailureSensorIQ.

</details>


### [164] [Towards Faithful and Controllable Personalization via Critique-Post-Edit Reinforcement Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18849)
*Chenghao Zhu,Meiling Tao,Tiannan Wang,Dongyi Ding,Yuchen Eleanor Jiang,Wangchunshu Zhou*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为Critique-Post-Edit的强化学习框架，用于更忠实、可控地实现大型语言模型（LLMs）的个性化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的个性化方法，如监督微调（SFT）和基于标量奖励模型的强化学习（RLHF），在处理个性化细微差别方面存在局限性，容易导致冗长和表面化的个性化回复。

Method: 该框架包含两个关键组件：1）一个个性化生成奖励模型（GRM），它提供多维度分数和文本评论，以抵抗奖励风险；2）一个“Critique-Post-Edit”机制，策略模型根据这些评论修改自身输出来实现更精确、高效的学习。

Result: 在严格的长度控制评估下，该方法在个性化基准测试中显著优于标准的PPO。个性化的Qwen2.5-7B平均获胜率提高了11%，个性化的Qwen2.5-14B模型性能超越了GPT-4.1。

Conclusion: 该研究展示了一条实现忠实、高效、可控的LLM个性化的实用途径。

Abstract: Faithfully personalizing large language models (LLMs) to align with
individual user preferences is a critical but challenging task. While
supervised fine-tuning (SFT) quickly reaches a performance plateau, standard
reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) also struggles with the
nuances of personalization. Scalar-based reward models are prone to reward
hacking which leads to verbose and superficially personalized responses. To
address these limitations, we propose Critique-Post-Edit, a robust
reinforcement learning framework that enables more faithful and controllable
personalization. Our framework integrates two key components: (1) a
Personalized Generative Reward Model (GRM) that provides multi-dimensional
scores and textual critiques to resist reward hacking, and (2) a
Critique-Post-Edit mechanism where the policy model revises its own outputs
based on these critiques for more targeted and efficient learning. Under a
rigorous length-controlled evaluation, our method substantially outperforms
standard PPO on personalization benchmarks. Personalized Qwen2.5-7B achieves an
average 11\% win-rate improvement, and personalized Qwen2.5-14B model surpasses
the performance of GPT-4.1. These results demonstrate a practical path to
faithful, efficient, and controllable personalization.

</details>


### [165] [Every Step Evolves: Scaling Reinforcement Learning for Trillion-Scale Thinking Model](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18855)
*Ling Team,Anqi Shen,Baihui Li,Bin Hu,Bin Jing,Cai Chen,Chao Huang,Chao Zhang,Chaokun Yang,Cheng Lin,Chengyao Wen,Congqi Li,Deng Zhao,Dingbo Yuan,Donghai You,Fagui Mao,Fanzhuang Meng,Feng Xu,Guojie Li,Guowei Wang,Hao Dai,Haonan Zheng,Hong Liu,Jia Guo,Jiaming Liu,Jian Liu,Jianhao Fu,Jiannan Shi,Jianwen Wang,Jianxin Lai,Jin Yang,Jun Mei,Jun Zhou,Junbo Zhao,Junping Zhao,Kuan Xu,Le Su,Lei Chen,Li Tang,Liang Jiang,Liangcheng Fu,Lianhao Xu,Linfeng Shi,Lisha Liao,Longfei Zheng,Meng Li,Mingchun Chen,Qi Zuo,Qiang Cheng,Qianggang Cao,Qitao Shi,Quanrui Guo,Senlin Zhu,Shaofei Wang,Shaomian Zheng,Shuaicheng Li,Shuwei Gu,Siba Chen,Tao Wu,Tao Zhang,Tianyu Zhang,Tianyu Zhou,Tiwei Bie,Tongkai Yang,Wang Hong,Wang Ren,Weihua Chen,Wenbo Yu,Wengang Zheng,Xiangchun Wang,Xiaodong Yan,Xiaopei Wan,Xin Zhao,Xinyu Kong,Xinyu Tang,Xudong Han,Xudong Wang,Xuemin Yang,Xueyu Hu,Yalin Zhang,Yan Sun,Yicheng Shan,Yilong Wang,Yingying Xu,Yongkang Liu,Yongzhen Guo,Yuanyuan Wang,Yuchen Yan,Yuefan Wang,Yuhong Guo,Zehuan Li,Zhankai Xu,Zhe Li,Zhenduo Zhang,Zhengke Gui,Zhenxuan Pan,Zhenyu Huang,Zhenzhong Lan,Zhiqiang Ding,Zhiqiang Zhang,Zhixun Li,Zhizhen Liu,Zihao Wang,Zujie Wen*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: Ring-1T是首个开源的万亿级参数思考模型，通过IcePop、C3PO++和ASystem三大创新解决了训练挑战，在多个基准测试中取得了突破性成果，并向社区开源，推动了大规模推理智能的普及。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 训练万亿级参数模型面临训练-推理失衡、长序列处理效率低下以及强化学习系统瓶颈等前所未有的挑战。

Method: 提出了IcePop（通过token级差异掩码和裁剪稳定强化学习训练）、C3PO++（通过动态分区提高长序列处理效率）和ASystem（高性能强化学习框架）三大创新。

Result: Ring-1T在AIME-2025、HMMT-2025、CodeForces和ARC-AGI-v1等关键基准测试中取得了突破性成果，并在IMO-2025上获得了银牌水平的成绩。

Conclusion: 通过向社区发布完整的1T参数MoE模型，Ring-1T为研究界提供了先进推理能力的直接访问权限，标志着大规模推理智能普及的重要里程碑，并为开源模型性能树立了新标杆。

Abstract: We present Ring-1T, the first open-source, state-of-the-art thinking model
with a trillion-scale parameter. It features 1 trillion total parameters and
activates approximately 50 billion per token. Training such models at a
trillion-parameter scale introduces unprecedented challenges, including
train-inference misalignment, inefficiencies in rollout processing, and
bottlenecks in the RL system. To address these, we pioneer three interconnected
innovations: (1) IcePop stabilizes RL training via token-level discrepancy
masking and clipping, resolving instability from training-inference mismatches;
(2) C3PO++ improves resource utilization for long rollouts under a token budget
by dynamically partitioning them, thereby obtaining high time efficiency; and
(3) ASystem, a high-performance RL framework designed to overcome the systemic
bottlenecks that impede trillion-parameter model training. Ring-1T delivers
breakthrough results across critical benchmarks: 93.4 on AIME-2025, 86.72 on
HMMT-2025, 2088 on CodeForces, and 55.94 on ARC-AGI-v1. Notably, it attains a
silver medal-level result on the IMO-2025, underscoring its exceptional
reasoning capabilities. By releasing the complete 1T parameter MoE model to the
community, we provide the research community with direct access to cutting-edge
reasoning capabilities. This contribution marks a significant milestone in
democratizing large-scale reasoning intelligence and establishes a new baseline
for open-source model performance.

</details>


### [166] [How Do LLMs Use Their Depth?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18871)
*Akshat Gupta,Jay Yeung,Gopala Anumanchipalli,Anna Ivanova*

Main category: cs.CL

TL;DR: LLMs do not use layers uniformly; this paper proposes a 'Guess-then-Refine' framework showing early layers guess high-frequency tokens which are refined in deeper layers. Analysis of part-of-speech, fact recall, and multiple-choice tasks reveals nuanced depth usage, with function words predicted earliest and response format identified early but finalized late.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Understanding the non-uniform layer usage in LLMs and gaining a fine-grained insight into their layer-wise prediction dynamics.

Method: Tracing intermediate representations in open-weight models during inference and proposing a 'Guess-then-Refine' framework. Analyzing part-of-speech, fact recall, and multiple-choice tasks.

Result: Early LLM layers predict high-frequency tokens as initial guesses. These guesses are refined in deeper layers over 70% of the time. Function words are predicted earliest. In multi-token answers, the first token requires more depth. Response format is identified early, but finalization occurs late.

Conclusion: LLMs exhibit structured and nuanced depth usage. The 'Guess-then-Refine' framework explains their internal computation for predictions. This understanding offers insights into improving computational efficiency in transformer-based models.

Abstract: Growing evidence suggests that large language models do not use their depth
uniformly, yet we still lack a fine-grained understanding of their layer-wise
prediction dynamics. In this paper, we trace the intermediate representations
of several open-weight models during inference and reveal a structured and
nuanced use of depth. Specifically, we propose a "Guess-then-Refine" framework
that explains how LLMs internally structure their computations to make
predictions. We first show that the top-ranked predictions in early LLM layers
are composed primarily of high-frequency tokens, which act as statistical
guesses proposed by the model early on due to the lack of appropriate
contextual information. As contextual information develops deeper into the
model, these initial guesses get refined into contextually appropriate tokens.
Even high-frequency token predictions from early layers get refined >70% of the
time, indicating that correct token prediction is not "one-and-done". We then
go beyond frequency-based prediction to examine the dynamic usage of layer
depth across three case studies. (i) Part-of-speech analysis shows that
function words are, on average, the earliest to be predicted correctly. (ii)
Fact recall task analysis shows that, in a multi-token answer, the first token
requires more computational depth than the rest. (iii) Multiple-choice task
analysis shows that the model identifies the format of the response within the
first half of the layers, but finalizes its response only toward the end.
Together, our results provide a detailed view of depth usage in LLMs, shedding
light on the layer-by-layer computations that underlie successful predictions
and providing insights for future works to improve computational efficiency in
transformer-based models.

</details>


<div id='cs.AR'></div>

# cs.AR [[Back]](#toc)

### [167] [From Quarter to All: Accelerating Speculative LLM Decoding via Floating-Point Exponent Remapping and Parameter Sharing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18525)
*Yushu Zhao,Yubin Qin,Yang Wang,Xiaolong Yang,Huiming Han,Shaojun Wei,Yang Hu,Shouyi Yin*

Main category: cs.AR

TL;DR: SPEQ通过算法-硬件协同设计，利用部分全模型权重比特构建量化草稿模型，实现高效的投机解码，速度超过FP16、Olive和Tender。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大型语言模型因参数量大导致推理延迟高，而量化和投机解码方法存在性能下降或额外开销问题。

Method: SPEQ采用算法-硬件协同设计，使用部分全模型权重比特构建量化草稿模型，并利用可重构处理单元阵列高效执行草稿和验证两阶段。

Result: 在15个大型语言模型和任务上的实验表明，SPEQ相比FP16、Olive和Tender分别实现了2.07倍、1.53倍和1.45倍的加速。

Conclusion: SPEQ通过消除额外的训练或存储开销，并实现高效的草稿和验证阶段，有效解决了大型语言模型的推理延迟问题。

Abstract: Large language models achieve impressive performance across diverse tasks but
exhibit high inference latency due to their large parameter sizes. While
quantization reduces model size, it often leads to performance degradation
compared to the full model. Speculative decoding remains lossless but typically
incurs extra overheads. We propose SPEQ, an algorithm-hardware co-designed
speculative decoding method that uses part of the full-model weight bits to
form a quantized draft model, thereby eliminating additional training or
storage overhead. A reconfigurable processing element array enables efficient
execution of both the draft and verification passes. Experimental results
across 15 LLMs and tasks demonstrate that SPEQ achieves speedups of 2.07x,
1.53x, and 1.45x compared over FP16, Olive, and Tender, respectively.

</details>


<div id='quant-ph'></div>

# quant-ph [[Back]](#toc)

### [168] [Experimental preparation of W states through many-body physics on a quantum simulator](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17974)
*Alberto Giuseppe Catalano,Ceren Dağ,Gianpaolo Torre,Salvatore Marco Giampaolo,Fabio Franchini*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种利用拓扑环挫用来在里德堡原子阵列中生成多体W态的协议，并通过实验实现了11个量子比特的态制备，并提出了一种新的保真度估计方法来验证实验结果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: W态因其拥有的多方和多方纠缠特性，在多种量子算法中具有潜在应用价值。

Method: 利用拓扑环挫的特性，在可编程的里德堡原子阵列上，通过数值模拟和实验相结合的方式来生成和验证W态。

Result: 成功制备了包含11个量子比特的Rubidium原子W态，并提出了一个只需要两组测量即可估计保真度的方法，实验证明了该方法的有效性，并为11个量子比特的态认证了大约77%的保真度下限。

Conclusion: 该研究提供了一种制备高质量量子纠缠W态的先进方法，并展示了物理学原理如何克服传统计算障碍，实现量子优势。

Abstract: $W$ states are quantum correlated states possessing both bipartite and
multipartite entanglement, which makes them useful for several quantum
algorithms. We propose a protocol to generate these states by exploiting {\it
topological ring frustration}, and implement it on a programmable Rydberg atom
array up to 11 qubits, successfully generating many-body $W$ states of Rubidium
atoms. Numerical simulations show promising scaling of the algorithm to tens of
qubits with near-term achievable updates on the quantum machines. To validate
our state preparation protocol and probe quantum entanglement, we devise a
fidelity estimator that requires only two sets of measurements. To implement
it, we develop a novel and efficient Bayesian state-tomography approach that
takes advantage of accurate classical numerical simulations to overcome
limitations in the experimental setup. Hence, a lower bound fidelity of around
$77\%$ is certified for the experimentally prepared state of 11 qubits. This
work provides a state-of-the-art procedure to generate high-quality quantum
entangled $W$ states, demonstrating once more how principles of physics can
overcome traditional barriers of computation, and be exploited for quantum
advantage.

</details>


### [169] [A Quantum Algorithm for the Finite Element Method](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18150)
*Ahmad M. Alkadri,Tyler D. Kharazi,K. Birgitta Whaley,Kranthi K. Mandadapu*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Qu-FEM是一种容错的量子有限元算法，通过引入新的原始方法，在保留FEM几何灵活性的同时，实现了量子求解偏微分方程。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出一种能够保留有限元方法（FEM）几何灵活性的量子算法，用于求解偏微分方程（PDE），以实现量子优势。

Method: 提出Qu-FEM算法，引入交互单元和局部到全局指示器矩阵，通过常数大小的酉算子线性组合来组装全局有限元阵列。对于常系数问题，使用Clifford+T门实现，其数量与维度、阶数和自由度相关。对于变系数问题，在量子计算机上直接进行数值积分来组装全局阵列和力向量，并使用拉格朗日乘子法处理狄利克雷边界条件。

Result: 对于d维度、p阶张量积单元在每个维度上具有2^n个自由度的网格，Qu-FEM算法使用~O(d^2 p^2 n)个Clifford+T门。对于变系数问题，实现了量子数值积分和边界条件处理。

Conclusion: Qu-FEM算法为扩展量子PDE求解器的几何灵活性提供了一个框架，并保留了实现量子优势的可能性。

Abstract: The finite element method (FEM) is a cornerstone numerical technique for
solving partial differential equations (PDEs). Here, we present
$\textbf{Qu-FEM}$, a fault-tolerant era quantum algorithm for the finite
element method. In contrast to other quantum PDE solvers, Qu-FEM preserves the
geometric flexibility of FEM by introducing two new primitives, the unit of
interaction and the local-to-global indicator matrix, which enable the assembly
of global finite element arrays with a constant-size linear combination of
unitaries. We study the modified Poisson equation as an elliptic problem of
interest, and provide explicit circuits for Qu-FEM in Cartesian domains. For
problems with constant coefficients, our algorithm admits block-encodings of
global arrays that require only $\tilde{\mathcal{O}}\left(d^2 p^2 n\right)$
Clifford+$T$ gates for $d$-dimensional, order-$p$ tensor product elements on
grids with $2^n$ degrees of freedom in each dimension, where $n$ is the number
of qubits representing the $N=2^n$ discrete grid points. For problems with
spatially varying coefficients, we perform numerical integration directly on
the quantum computer to assemble global arrays and force vectors. Dirichlet
boundary conditions are enforced via the method of Lagrange multipliers,
eliminating the need to modify the block-encodings that emerge from the
assembly procedure. This work presents a framework for extending the geometric
flexibility of quantum PDE solvers while preserving the possibility of a
quantum advantage.

</details>


### [170] [Full-stack Physics-level model of cascaded entanglement links](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17976)
*J. Gabriel Richardson,Prajit Dhara,Abhishek Bhatt,Saikat Guha,Stefan Krastanov*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: ZALM光源在量子网络中的应用


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决现有纠缠源在实际部署中的不足，如可靠性、多维复用和功率效率问题。

Method: 开发了一个名为genqo的Python工具包，用于模拟ZALM光源在各种条件下的表现，并将其集成到QuantumSavory和QuantumSymbolics中。

Result: 成功模拟了基于ZALM光源的多种量子网络协议。

Conclusion: genqo工具包为ZALM光源在量子网络中的实际应用提供了强大的模拟支持。

Abstract: While the last few decades have seen a proliferation of experimental
demonstrations of entanglement sources, practicality of deployment has been a
secondary concern. Recently, the ZALM source was introduced, as a well
engineered functional device, easily integrated within a complete networking
system. It addresses numerous concerns which make typical academic
demonstrations less practical: reliable heralding signals, multiplexing across
multiple dimensions, and efficient use of input power. We present a stack of
tools for modeling mode by mode a ZALM source under realistic conditions, in
isolation, or as a part of a complete network testbed. Our modeling formalism
builds upon a hybrid Gaussian and non-Gaussian representation, providing a
flexible tradeoff between performance and accuracy, while also greatly
simplifying the exact calculation of otherwise expensive scalar figures of
merit. This toolkit, implemented in the python package called genqo, is
integrated within the QuantumSavory full stack simulator and the
QuantumSymbolics computer algebra system. We use this software stack to
demonstrate a number of complete networking protocols built upon the ZALM
source.

</details>


### [171] [Quantum Hamiltonian simulation of linearised Euler equations in complex geometries](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17978)
*Vladyslav Bohun,Andrij Kuzmak,Maciej Koch-Janusz*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究将量子计算应用于求解计算流体动力学（CFD）中的偏微分方程（PDE），并扩展了现有方法以处理更复杂的边界条件和实际应用场景。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子计算有望在解决高分辨率CFD模拟中的PDE方面提供指数级改进，这在航空航天和天气预报等领域至关重要。

Method: 本研究通过将经典CFD问题映射到量子哈密顿量演化，并扩展了现有的量子电路构造方法，以处理任意复杂形状的障碍物产生的边界条件。研究中还推导了模拟带背景流和障碍物的线性欧拉方程的量子电路，并分析了其Trotter误差和门复杂度。

Result: 研究中演示了如何将边界条件引入PDE的量子表示中，并提供了显式且高效的电路构造。此外，还为模拟带背景流和障碍物的线性欧拉方程推导了量子电路，并通过模拟演示了结果，将量子解的误差与经典有限差分方法进行了比较。

Conclusion: 本研究成功扩展了量子计算在CFD领域的应用，为处理包含复杂边界条件的实际PDE问题提供了新的量子算法和电路构造方法，并在模拟结果中展示了其有效性。

Abstract: Quantum computing promises exponential improvements in solving large systems
of partial differential equations (PDE), which forms a bottleneck in
high-resolution computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations, in, among
others, aerospace applications and weather forecasting. One approach is via
mapping classical CFD problems to a quantum Hamiltonian evolution, for which
recently an explicit quantum circuit construction has been shown in simple
cases, allowing proof-of-concept execution on quantum processors. Here we
extended this method to more complex and practically relevant cases. We first
demonstrate how boundary conditions corresponding to arbitrary complex-shaped
obstacles can be introduced in the quantum representations of elementary
difference operators used to implement the PDE. We provide explicit and
efficient circuit constructions, and show they neither increase the Trotter
error, nor asymptotic gate complexity with respect to the free space equation.
Using these methods we then derive quantum circuits for simulating the
linearized Euler equations in a presence of a background fluid flow and
obstacles. We illustrate our results by simulating the obtained quantum
circuits for a number of boundary conditions, and compare the errors of the
quantum solution to classical finite difference methods.

</details>


### [172] [Application Scale Quantum Circuit Compilation and Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18000)
*Justin Kalloor,Lucas Kovalsky,Mathias Weiden,John Kubiatowicz,Ed Younis,Costin Iancu,Mohan Sarovar*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子电路编译和优化需要在最小化资源消耗（如两比特门、任意角度单比特旋转）和最小化编译电路与目标幺正算符之间的近似误差之间取得平衡。我们提出了一种可扩展的工作流，通过电路划分和电路集合平均来管理和优化这种权衡，并在最多 380 个量子比特的基准算法电路上进行了演示，实现了资源消耗和输出误差的显著降低。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子计算机的编译和优化是执行量子算法的关键部分，需要在最小化资源消耗和近似误差之间取得平衡。

Method: 利用电路划分和电路集合平均的思想，开发了一种实用的工作流，用于管理和优化这种权衡。

Result: 在最多 380 个量子比特的基准算法电路上证明了该工作流，同时实现了资源密集型门和控制输出错误的显著减少。

Conclusion: 所提出的工作流为近期的和容错的量子计算提供了一种实际且可扩展的策略，能够处理大规模量子电路并保证输出误差。

Abstract: Compilation and optimization of quantum circuits are critical components in
the execution of algorithms on quantum computers. These components must
successfully balance two competing priorities: minimizing the number of
expensive resources, such as two-qubit gates or arbitrary angle single-qubit
rotations, and minimizing the approximation error of the compiled circuit to
the ideal target unitary describing the quantum algorithm. We develop a
practical workflow for managing and optimizing this tradeoff, which enables
quantum circuit compilation and optimization at scales of hundreds of qubits.
Our workflow is able to tackle circuits at such large scales while providing
rigorous guarantees on circuit output error by leveraging circuit partitioning
and the notion of averaging over circuit ensembles. We demonstrate our workflow
on several benchmark algorithmic circuits acting on up to 380 qubits, and show
that it can simultaneously achieve substantial reductions in resource-intensive
gates and control output errors, offering a practical and scalable strategy for
both near-term and fault-tolerant quantum computing.

</details>


### [173] [Quantum Computing Approach to Atomic and Molecular Three-Body Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18005)
*Mohammad Haidar,Hugo D. Nogueira,J. -Ph. Karr*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究使用NI-DUCC-VQE方法对三体原子（He，H-）和分子（H2+，HD+）进行了高精度量子计算模拟，特别是在H2+和HD+中超越了玻恩-奥本海默近似。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究的动机是开发一种高效的量子计算方法来精确模拟多体原子和分子系统，特别是超越传统近似方法（如玻恩-奥本海默近似）的限制，并探索其在当前含噪声中尺度量子（NISQ）设备上的应用潜力。

Method: 研究采用了非迭代分离幺正耦合簇变分量子本征求解器（NI-DUCC-VQE）方法。该方法结合了第一量化哈密顿量和最小完备李代数激发池（MCP），构建了一个紧凑的、梯度无关的ansatz，避免了昂贵的梯度评估，实现了计算效率的良好扩展性，并能避免Barren Plateaus问题，从而能够快速收敛。

Result: 研究结果显示，该方法在所有四种系统（He，H-，H2+，HD+）中，仅需几千次函数评估，就能达到低至10^-11 a.u.的能量误差和接近算术精度的保真度。此外，该方法还展示了模拟高阶效应（如相对论校正和超精细相互作用）的能力。

Conclusion: 本研究表明，三体原子和分子是利用当前NISQ设备进行基准测试和检验的理想候选者。所提出的NI-DUCC-VQE方法具有高效的可扩展性，能够处理更复杂的系统和更大的基组，精确研究电子关联和非绝热效应，并能模拟高阶物理效应。

Abstract: We present high-precision quantum computing simulations of three-body atoms
(He, H$^-$) and molecules (H$_2^+$, HD$^+$), the latter being studied beyond
the Born-Oppenheimer approximation. The Non-Iterative Disentangled Unitary
Coupled Cluster Variational Quantum Eigensolver (NI-DUCC-VQE) [M. Haidar et
al., Quantum Sci. Technol. 10, 025031 (2025)] is used. By combining a
first-quantized Hamiltonian with a Minimal Complete Pool (MCP) of Lie-algebraic
excitations, we construct a compact ansatz with a gradient-independent
construction, avoiding costly gradient evaluations and yielding efficient
computational scaling with both basis size and electron number. It avoids
barren plateaus and enables rapid convergence, achieving energy errors as low
as 10$^{-11}$ a.u. with state fidelities only limited by arithmetic precision
in only a few thousand function evaluations in all four systems. These results
make three-body atoms and molecules excellent candidates for benchmarking and
testing on current Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum (NISQ) devices. Further,
our approach can be extended to more complex systems with larger basis sets,
taking advantage of the efficient scaling of qubit requirements to study
electronic correlations and non-adiabatic effects with high precision. We also
demonstrate the applicability of NI-DUCC-VQE for simulating higher-order
effects such as relativistic corrections and hyperfine interactions.

</details>


### [174] [Virus Spreading in Quantum Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18105)
*Junpeng Hou,Mark M. Seidel,Chuanwei Zhang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子网络比经典网络对病毒传播更具韧性，但这种优势在连接性相同时会消失。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究量子网络中的病毒传播问题，并与经典网络进行比较。

Method: 使用改进的非线性动力学系统模型进行流行病学分析。

Result: 量子网络具有更高的流行病阈值，但当连接性相同时，与经典网络的表现相当。

Conclusion: 量子网络的鲁棒性主要源于其稀疏连接性，这对于未来量子通信系统的安全性和可靠性至关重要。

Abstract: Recent advances in quantum communication have enabled long-distance secure
information transfer through quantum channels, giving rise to quantum networks
with unique physical and statistical properties. However, as in classical
networks, the propagation of viruses in these systems could have severe
consequences. Here, we investigate the critical problem of virus spreading in
quantum networks. We develop quantitative tools, particularly a modified
nonlinear dynamical system model, for performing epidemiological analyses on
quantum networks. Our results show that quantum networks tend to be more
resilient to viral infections, exhibiting higher epidemic thresholds than
classical networks with identical graph topologies. This apparent robustness,
however, arises primarily from the sparser connectivity inherent to the quantum
networks. When the comparison is made at a fixed average connectivity,
classical and quantum networks display comparable epidemic thresholds. These
findings provide key insights into the security and reliability of future
large-scale quantum communication systems. Our work bridges the fields of
quantum information science, network theory, and epidemiology, paving the way
for future studies of quantum epidemiological dynamics.

</details>


### [175] [Incomplete yet existent objects: a Nuclear Meinongian approach to quantum metaphysical indeterminacy](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18111)
*Raoni Arroyo,Renato Semaniuc Valvassori*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本文从帕森斯的核门罗尼安主义视角解读了量子形而上学不确定性，发现其与标准量子力学存在根本不兼容之处，并提出了“不完备蕴含非存在”原理（IENP），该原理不合理地推断了量子对象的不存在。为使门罗尼安主义适用于量子力学形而上学，必须解决IENP问题。本文主张放弃IENP，并探讨其产生的形而上学和元形而上学后果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子形而上学不确定性与帕森斯的核门罗尼安主义的兼容性问题。

Method: 将量子不确定性解读为属性不完备性，并结合帕森斯理论，推导出“不完备蕴含非存在”原理（IENP），然后论证放弃IENP。

Result: 发现帕森斯理论的一个关键特征与标准量子力学不兼容，导致了IENP，该原理不合理地推断了量子对象的不存在。

Conclusion: 应放弃IENP，并探讨其形而上学和元形而上学后果，以使门罗尼安主义能更好地应用于量子力学形而上学。

Abstract: This article proposes a reading of quantum metaphysical indeterminacy from
the perspective of Parsons' Nuclear Meinongianism. In doing so, we identify a
fundamental incompatibility between a key feature of Parsons' theory and
standard quantum mechanics. Our approach interprets quantum indeterminacy as
property incompleteness. However, this move, when combined with Parsons'
framework, leads to what we term the ``Incompleteness-Entails-Nonexistence
Principle'' (IENP), which implausibly entails the nonexistence of quantum
objects. For Meinongianism to be a suitable tool for the metaphysics of quantum
mechanics, this principle must be addressed. We argue for dropping the IENP and
discuss the resulting metaphysical and metametaphysical consequences.

</details>


### [176] [Quantum-Assisted Barrier Sequential Quadratic Programming for Nonlinear Optimal Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18116)
*Nahid Binandeh Dehaghani,Rafal Wisniewski,A. Pedro Aguiar*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一种量子辅助框架，利用障碍序贯二次规划（SQP）方法解决约束有限时间非线性最优控制问题。该框架嵌入量子子程序，通过块编码和量子奇异值变换（QSVT）技术高效求解 Schur 补数。研究 formally 分析了量子误差累积效应下的时间和收敛行为，建立了输入状态稳定性，并证明了收敛到不动点邻域，给出了关于障碍参数和量子求解器精度的误差界限。该框架的计算复杂度与系统维度的对数成多项式伸缩，展示了量子算法在增强经典优化例程和解决非线性控制问题方面的潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决约束有限时间非线性最优控制问题，并利用量子计算加速求解过程。

Method: 提出量子辅助框架，结合障碍 SQP 方法和量子子程序（利用块编码和 QSVT 技术求解 Schur 补数）。

Result: 在量子误差累积下，建立了局部输入状态稳定性和收敛到不动点邻域的性质，并给出了误差界限。计算复杂度与系统维度的对数成多项式伸缩。

Conclusion: 所提出的量子辅助框架能够有效解决约束有限时间非线性最优控制问题，并展示了量子算法在增强经典优化方法方面的潜力。

Abstract: We propose a quantum-assisted framework for solving constrained
finite-horizon nonlinear optimal control problems using a barrier Sequential
Quadratic Programming (SQP) approach. Within this framework, a quantum
subroutine is incorporated to efficiently solve the Schur complement step using
block-encoding and Quantum Singular Value Transformation (QSVT) techniques. We
formally analyze the time complexity and convergence behavior under the
cumulative effect of quantum errors, establishing local input-to-state
stability and convergence to a neighborhood of the stationary point, with
explicit error bounds in terms of the barrier parameter and quantum solver
accuracy. The proposed framework enables computational complexity to scale
polylogarithmically with the system dimension demonstrating the potential of
quantum algorithms to enhance classical optimization routines in nonlinear
control applications.

</details>


### [177] [Chiral light from an emitter coupled to an achiral particle via the Purcell effect](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18166)
*Yining Xuan,Daito Miyazaki,Yuki Ishikawa,Mark Sadgrove*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 非手性纳米粒子在特定条件下可产生手性光。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 实现由非手性纳米粒子产生手性光。

Method: 利用非手性纳米粒子表面的等离激元模式（SPMs）和点发射器的耦合，结合腔量子电动力学（QED）的Purcell效应，以及实验中使用的电子束诱导的纳米金棒阴极发光与纳米光纤的耦合。

Result: 实验证明了金纳米棒的发射光通过纳米光纤耦合后，表现出手性，即发射的净自旋转化为传播的净方向性。

Conclusion: 非手性纳米粒子可以通过耦合到其等离激元模式来产生手性光，该效应在腔量子电动力学（QED）的Purcell区和自旋-动量锁定效应的共同作用下得以实现。

Abstract: We demonstrate that non-chiral nanoparticles can produce chiral light when
point emitters are coupled to their surface plasmon modes (SPMs) under certain
conditions. Chiral emission arises from asymmetrical plasmon mode propagation
from the source combined with the spin-momentum locked nature of the SPMs. The
Purcell regime of cavity quantum electrodynamics (QED) ensures that radiation
from the coupled mode dominates over that from the emitter itself, giving rise
to photons with a circularly polarized component -- i.e. chiral light. We
experimentally demonstrate this effect using electron beam-induced cathode
luminescence from a gold nanorod, coupling it evanescently to a nanofiber probe
which also supports spin-momentum locked light. This converts the net spin of
the emission into a net directionality of propagation in the fiber modes.

</details>


### [178] [Burau representation, Squier's form, and non-Abelian anyons](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18186)
*Alexander Kolpakov*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: A frequency-tunable, non-Abelian control switch built from braid group representations is introduced, providing an analytic witness for causal non-separability and a minimal non-Abelian control for anyonic statistics.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to introduce a frequency-tunable, two-dimensional non-Abelian control over operation order using the reduced Burau representation of the braid group $B_3$, specialized at $t=e^{i	heta}$ and unitarized by Squier's Hermitian form. The goal is to achieve causal non-separability through algebraic means.

Method: The study utilizes the reduced Burau representation of the braid group $B_3$ at $t=e^{i	heta}$ and Squier's Hermitian form to construct a non-Abelian control switch coupled to two non-commuting qubit unitaries A and B. This setup allows for a closed expression for the single-shot Helstrom success and a fixed-order ceiling $p_{m fixed}^*$, leading to an explicit, analytic witness gap $\Delta(\omega)=p_{\rm switch}(\omega)-p_{\rm fixed}^*$.

Result: The paper derives an explicit, analytic witness gap $\Delta(\omega)=p_{\rm switch}(\omega)-p_{\rm fixed}^*$ and proves that $\Delta(\omega)>0$ is achievable, thus certifying causal non-separability by purely algebraic means. This behavior is also confirmed numerically.

Conclusion: The introduced frequency-tunable, two-dimensional non-Abelian control, built from the braid group $B_3$, provides a minimal non-Abelian control for anyonic statistics and enables the certification of causal non-separability through algebraic means, with its performance validated both analytically and numerically.

Abstract: We introduce a frequency-tunable, two-dimensional non-Abelian control over
operation order built from the reduced Burau representation of the braid group
$B_3$, specialised at $t=e^{i\omega}$ and unitarized by Squier's Hermitian
form. Coupled to two non-commuting qubit unitaries $A,B$, the resulting switch
admits a closed expression for the single-shot Helstrom success and a
fixed-order ceiling $p_{\rm fixed}^*$, yielding an explicit, analytic witness
gap $\Delta(\omega)=p_{\rm switch}(\omega)-p_{\rm fixed}^*$. We prove that
$\Delta(\omega)>0$ is achievable, thereby certifying causal non-separability by
purely algebraic means, and confirm this behaviour numerically. Conceptually,
this furnishes a minimal non-Abelian $B_3$ control for a Gedankenexperiment in
anyonic statistics.

</details>


### [179] [Near-optimal Prediction Error Estimation for Quantum Machine Learning Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18208)
*Qiuhao Chen,Yuling Jiao,Yinan Li,Xiliang Lu,Jerry Zhijian Yang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本论文研究了量子机器学习模型在有限数据集上的性能界限，特别是针对数据重上传和线性量子模型。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 理解量子机器学习模型解决机器学习任务的理论能力和局限性，对于推进量子软件和硬件发展至关重要，而模型在有限数据上的性能会受到显著影响。

Method: 推导了数据重上传量子模型和线性量子模型的覆盖数和打包数界限，并在此基础上建立了预测误差界限。

Result: 提出了针对数据重上传量子模型和线性量子模型的预测误差界限，并通过数值模拟验证了理论发现。

Conclusion: 为优化量子机器学习模型在有限数据集上的性能提供了理论指导。

Abstract: Understanding the theoretical capabilities and limitations of quantum machine
learning (QML) models to solve machine learning tasks is crucial to advancing
both quantum software and hardware developments. Similarly to the classical
setting, the performance of QML models can be significantly affected by the
limited access to the underlying data set. Previous studies have focused on
proving generalization error bounds for any QML models trained on a limited
finite training set. We focus on the optimal QML models obtained by training
them on a finite training set and establish a tight prediction error bound in
terms of the number of trainable gates and the size of training sets. To
achieve this, we derive covering number upper bounds and packing number lower
bounds for the data re-uploading QML models and linear QML models,
respectively, which may be of independent interest. We support our theoretical
findings by numerically simulating the QML strategies for function
approximation and quantum phase recognition.

</details>


### [180] [Information geometry of nonmonotonic quantum natural gradient](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18286)
*Hideyuki Miyahara*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本文研究了非单调量子自然梯度（QNG）的性质，并提出了一种新的QNG方法，该方法在量子电路学习参数估计问题中表现出比传统QNG更快的收敛速度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 旨在解决量子信息几何中量化过程的固有歧义性，并探索比传统QNG收敛更快的优化方法。

Method: 1. 证明了SLD度量在单调性条件下是局部最优的。2. 证明了非单调量子Fisher度量可以加速QNG的收敛。3. 考虑了替代的量子散度并扩展到非满秩情况。4. 使用Petz函数设计量子Fisher度量。5. 通过数值模拟比较了不同量子Fisher度量在量子电路学习参数估计问题中的性能。

Result: 非单调QNG相比传统QNG具有更快的收敛速度。所提出的方法在非满秩情况下也有效，并能通过Petz函数进行设计。

Conclusion: 非单调QNG是一种有前景的优化方法，在量子信息处理和机器学习中有潜在应用。

Abstract: Natural gradient is an advanced optimization method based on information
geometry, where the Fisher metric plays a crucial role.
  Its quantum counterpart, known as quantum natural gradient (QNG), employs the
symmetric logarithmic derivative (SLD) metric, one of the quantum Fisher
metrics.
  While quantization in physics is typically well-defined via the canonical
commutation relations, the quantization of information-theoretic quantities
introduces inherent arbitrariness.
  To resolve this ambiguity, monotonicity has been used as a guiding principle
for constructing geometries in physics, as it aligns with physical intuition.
  Recently, a variant of QNG, which we refer to as nonmonotonic QNG in this
paper, was proposed by relaxing the monotonicity condition.
  It was shown to achieve faster convergence compared to conventional QNG.
  In this paper, we investigate the properties of nonmonotonic QNG.
  To ensure the paper is self-contained, we first demonstrate that the SLD
metric is locally optimal under the monotonicity condition and that
non-monotone quantum Fisher metrics can lead to faster convergence in QNG.
  Previous studies primarily relied on a specific type of quantum divergence
and assumed that density operators are full-rank.
  Here, we explicitly consider an alternative quantum divergence and extend the
analysis to non-full-rank cases.
  Additionally, we explore how geometries can be designed using Petz functions,
given that quantum Fisher metrics are characterized through them.
  Finally, we present numerical simulations comparing different quantum Fisher
metrics in the context of parameter estimation problems in quantum circuit
learning.

</details>


### [181] [Entanglement Spectrum Resolved by Loop Symmetries](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18350)
*Haruki Yagi,Zongping Gong*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本文对具有高阶表示对称性的量子多体态的纠缠谱进行了严格分析，发现其对称性通常是不可逆的。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 分析具有高阶表示对称性的量子多体态的纠缠谱，并探讨拓扑结构对其纠缠性质的影响。

Method: 利用初等代数拓扑和范畴论，以及规范不变性，构建了描述约化密度矩阵块结构的通用框架，并应用于低维流形和二维量子双 মূল্যা模型。

Result: 提出了一个通用框架，能够确定任意二分流形上量子多体态的纠缠谱的块结构，并精确复现了二维Kitaev量子双 মূল্যা模型的拓扑纠缠熵和Li-Haldane猜想。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地将代数拓扑和范畴论应用于量子多体纠缠谱的分析，为理解拓扑规范场论中的纠缠结构提供了新的视角。

Abstract: A rigorous analysis is presented for the entanglement spectrum of quantum
many-body states possessing a higher-form group-representation symmetry
generated by topological Wilson loops, which is generally non-invertible. A
general framework based on elementary algebraic topology and category theory is
developed to determine the block structure of reduced density matrices for
arbitrary bipartite manifolds on which the states are defined. Within this
framework, we scrutinize the impact of topology on the entanglement structure
for low-dimensional manifolds, including especially the torus, the Klein
bottle, and lens spaces. By further incorporating gauge invariance, we refine
our framework to determine the entanglement structure for topological gauge
theories in arbitrary dimensions. In particular, in two dimensions, it is shown
for the Kitaev quantum double model that not only the topological entanglement
entropy can be reproduced, but also the Li-Haldane conjecture concerning the
full entanglement spectrum holds exactly.

</details>


### [182] [Coherence-induced deep thermalization transition in random permutation quantum dynamics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18369)
*Chang Liu,Matteo Ippoliti,Wen Wei Ho*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 我们发现了一种在随机置换动力学下出现的投影集合相变，该相变区分了深度热化（Haar随机）和最小熵（经典比特串集合）两种状态，而子系统的密度矩阵对此不敏感。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 探究在随机置换动力学下量子多体系统中的相变，特别是与深度热化相关的相变。

Method: 结合解析论证和数值模拟，分析了投影集合的行为，并研究了影响相变的因素，如相干性输入和测量基。

Result: 发现了深度热化相变，它将深度热化（Haar随机）相与最小熵（经典比特串集合）相区分开来。密度矩阵在相变过程中保持不变，始终表现为无限温度下的热化。

Conclusion: 该相变是一种新颖的量子多体动力学中的遍历性破坏普适性，其特征不是常规热化失效，而是深度热化失效。

Abstract: We report a phase transition in the projected ensemble - the collection of
post-measurement wavefunctions of a local subsystem obtained by measuring its
complement. The transition emerges in systems undergoing random permutation
dynamics, a type of quantum time evolution wherein computational basis states
are shuffled without creating superpositions. It separates a phase exhibiting
deep thermalization, where the projected ensemble is distributed over Hilbert
space in a maximally entropic fashion (Haar-random), from a phase where it is
minimally entropic ("classical bit-string ensemble"). Crucially, this deep
thermalization transition is invisible to the subsystem's density matrix, which
always exhibits thermalization to infinite-temperature across the phase
diagram. Through a combination of analytical arguments and numerical
simulations, we show that the transition is tuned by the total amount of
coherence injected by the input state and the measurement basis, and is
exhibited robustly across different microscopic models. Our findings represent
a novel form of ergodicity-breaking universality in quantum many-body dynamics,
characterized not by a failure of regular thermalization, but rather by a
failure of deep thermalization.

</details>


### [183] [Parametric resonant enhancement of motional entanglement under optimal control: an analytical study](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18427)
*Gad Horovitz,Alexander N. Poddubny*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 研究了在反馈控制下，光学囚禁的重粒子运动自由度之间连续变量的纠缠。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 该研究的动机是理论上研究光学囚禁的重粒子运动自由度之间连续变量的纠缠，特别是在存在反馈控制方案的情况下。

Method: 通过对系统耦合的非线性、非齐次动力学方程进行详细分析，研究了由耦合强度的时间调制引起的参数共振。

Result: 模型能够准确重现数值结果，并给出纠缠度的封闭表达式，证明了由于参数增益和退相干的竞争，实现了一个稳态的非平衡纠缠态。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地在理论上阐述了在反馈控制下，通过参数共振实现重粒子运动自由度之间连续变量纠缠的机制，并得到了稳态非平衡纠缠态。

Abstract: We study theoretically continuous-variable entanglement between the motional
degrees of freedom of optically trapped massive particles coupled via the
Coulomb interaction, in the presence of a feedback control scheme. We perform a
detailed analysis of the parametric resonance induced by temporal modulation of
the coupling strength, based on the system's coupled nonlinear, nonhomogeneous
dynamical equations. Our model accurately reproduces the numerical findings and
provides closed-form expressions for the entanglement degree. We demonstrate
that a stationary nonequilibrium entangled state is realized as a result of the
competition between parametric gain and decoherence.

</details>


### [184] [Every Benchmark All at Once](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18453)
*Ana Silva,Eliska Greplova*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究将五种最常见的随机基准测试技术用量子比特集层析成像的现代语言重新表述，以应对量子设备基准测试的挑战。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子技术日益成熟，但量子设备的高效基准测试仍然是一个关键挑战。尽管已提出了样本量高效、信息论的基准测试技术，但将这些技术应用于当前实验仍存在差距。

Method: 将五种最常见的随机基准测试技术用量子比特集层析成像的现代语言重新表述，并提出一种提取量子比特泄露误差的最小化方法。

Result: 重新表述带来了几个具体的优势：对于标准和交错随机基准测试，可以减少所需的量子比特集大小和实验样本量；对于同步和相关随机基准测试，可以通过对单个实验数据集的后处理来重建相关噪声通道的保利项。此外，还提出了一种提取量子比特泄露误差的最小化方法。

Conclusion: 这项工作为全面、可靠和便捷的量子设备基准测试提供了一条清晰的途径，所有方法都在一个统一的技术框架下进行表述，并且可以轻松适应各种实验量和量子比特集。

Abstract: As quantum technology matures, the efficient benchmarking of quantum devices
remains a key challenge. Although sample-efficient, information-theoretic
benchmarking techniques have recently been proposed, there is still a gap in
adapting these techniques to contemporary experiments. In this work, we
re-formulate five of the most common randomized benchmarking techniques in the
modern language of the gate-set shadow tomography. This reformulation brings
along several concrete advantages over conventional formulations of randomized
benchmarking. For standard and interleaved randomized benchmarking, we can
reduce the required gate-set size and, using median-of-means estimators, also
reduce the required experimental sample size. For simultaneous and correlated
randomized benchmarking, we can additionally reconstruct the Pauli-terms of
correlated noise channels using additional post-processing of only a single
experimental dataset. We also present a minimal approach to extract leakage
errors. Our work provides a clear avenue for comprehensive, reliable, and
convenient benchmarking of quantum devices, with all methods formulated under a
single umbrella technique that can be easily adapted to a range of experimental
quantities and gate sets.

</details>


### [185] [Quantum Reversibility Meets Classical Reverse Diffusion](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18512)
*Ryota Nasu,Gota Tanaka,Asato Tsuchiya*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子Petz图与经典贝叶斯规则和 Fokker-Planck 方程在半经典近似下有直接联系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 文章旨在探讨量子Petz图与经典贝叶斯规则和Fokker-Planck方程之间的联系，并利用半经典近似来统一量子可逆性和经典反向扩散。

Method: 通过对Lindblad方程进行半经典近似，推导出Wigner函数的Fokker-Planck方程。同时，对与Petz图相关的Lindblad方程进行同样的近似，得到与经典贝叶斯规则反向扩散方程一致的方程。

Result: 半经典近似的Lindblad方程可以得到Wigner函数的Fokker-Planck方程。相同的近似应用于Petz图的Lindblad方程，得到的结果与通过贝叶斯规则从Fokker-Planck方程得到的方程一致。

Conclusion: 量子Petz图与贝叶斯规则之间存在直接对应关系，将量子可逆性与经典反向扩散统一起来。

Abstract: Bayes' rule connects forward and reverse processes in classical probability
theory, and its quantum analogue has been discussed in terms of the Petz
(transpose) map. For quantum dynamics governed by the Lindblad equation, the
corresponding Petz map can also be written in Lindblad form. In classical
stochastic systems, the analogue of the Lindblad equation is the Fokker-Planck
equation, and applying Bayes' rule to it yields the reverse diffusion equation
underlying modern diffusion-based generative models. Here we demonstrate that a
semiclassical approximation of the Lindblad equation yields the Fokker-Planck
equation for the Wigner function -- a quasiprobability distribution defined on
phase space as the Wigner transform of the density operator. Applying the same
approximation to the Lindblad equation associated with the Petz map produces an
equation that coincides with that obtained from the Fokker-Planck equation via
Bayes' rule. This finding establishes a direct correspondence between the Petz
map and Bayes' rule, unifying quantum reversibility with classical reverse
diffusion.

</details>


### [186] [Grid-Partitioned MWIS Solving with Neutral Atom Quantum Computing for QUBO Problems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18540)
*Soumyadip Das,Suman Kumar Roy,Rahul Rana,M Girish Chandra*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种混合量子-经典框架，利用中性原子量子计算通过将二次无约束二元优化 (QUBO) 问题映射到单位盘图上的最大加权独立集 (MWIS) 问题来解决 QUBO 问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现实世界中的二次无约束二元优化 (QUBO) 问题（例如投资组合优化）规模大且计算难度大。

Method: 该框架使用空间网格划分将 QUBO 问题分解为子图，然后使用模拟哈密顿模拟 (AHS) 求解每个子图，最后通过贪婪合并来近似全局最优解。

Result: 在 50 只股票的投资组合优化问题上，与经典的模拟退火算法相比，该框架表现出了有竞争力的性能。

Conclusion: 该框架在嘈杂中型量子 (NISQ) 时代具有可扩展性和实际应用潜力，为有效解决大规模优化问题提供了一条有前途的途径。

Abstract: Quadratic Unconstrained Binary Optimization (QUBO) problems are prevalent in
real-world applications, such as portfolio optimization, but pose significant
computational challenges for large-scale instances. We propose a hybrid
quantum-classical framework that leverages neutral atom quantum computing to
address QUBO problems by mapping them to the Maximum Weighted Independent Set
(MWIS) problem on unit disk graphs. Our approach employs spatial grid
partitioning to decompose the problem into manageable subgraphs, solves each
subgraph using Analog Hamiltonian Simulation (AHS), and merges solutions
greedily to approximate the global optimum. We evaluate the framework on a
50-asset portfolio optimization problem using historical S\&P 500 data,
benchmarking against classical simulated annealing. Results demonstrate
competitive performance, highlighting the scalability and practical potential
of our method in the Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum (NISQ) era. As neutral
atom quantum hardware advances, our framework offers a promising path toward
solving large-scale optimization problems efficiently.

</details>


### [187] [Chip-to-chip hyperentanglement distribution and entanglement purification using silicon integrated photonics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18562)
*Yonghe Yu,Mujtaba Zahidy,Siyan Zhou,Caterina Viligar,Karsten Rottwitt,Leif Katsuo Oxenløwe,Yunhong Ding*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该论文首次展示了基于硅基芯片的片到片超纠缠分发和量子纠缠纯化技术，解决了现有量子纠缠纯化实验依赖分立器件的局限性，为实现光子集成量子中继器铺平了道路。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的量子纠缠纯化实验依赖于片外分立器件，限制了可扩展性、稳定性和可控性。本研究旨在克服这一限制，实现基于集成硅芯片的量子纠缠纯化。

Method: 论文利用集成硅芯片产生路径编码的高维纠缠光子对，通过光栅耦合器将其转换为基于光纤的偏振-空间超纠缠，分发至接收端硅芯片，并利用空间自由度进行纠缠纯化。

Result: 成功实现了片到片超纠缠分发和量子纠缠纯化，这是首次在集成硅芯片上完成此项技术。

Conclusion: 基于集成光子学的量子纠缠纯化方案完成了片上量子中继器的最后一块拼图，将有力推动光子集成量子中继器的实现。

Abstract: Quantum repeaters are employed in quantum communication to overcome the
long-distance transmission loss of quantum states. The quantum repeater is
based on various key technologies, including quantum entanglement swapping,
quantum memory, and entanglement purification. In particular, quantum
purification can distil high-quality entanglement from the degraded entangled
states which is propagating through noisy quantum communication channels.
Although previous reports have demonstrated on-chip entanglement swapping and
teleportation through the less-noisy channel, current entanglement purification
experiments still rely on off-chip discrete devices, leading to limitations on
scalability, stability, and controllability. In this paper, for the first time,
we demonstrated chip-to-chip hyperentanglement distribution and quantum
entanglement purification based on integrated silicon chips. Path-encoded
high-dimensional entangled photon pairs are produced on the chip, converted to
fibre-based polarization-spatial hyperentanglement by grating couplers,
distributed to the receiver silicon chip, and finally purified by consuming the
spatial degree of freedom. Our purification scheme by integrated photonics
finished the last puzzle of on-chip quantum repeater, which will promote the
realization of the quantum repeater based on integrated photonics.

</details>


### [188] [Renormalized dual basis for scalable simulations of 2+1D compact quantum electrodynamics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18594)
*Marc Miranda-Riaza,Pierpaolo Fontana,Alessio Celi*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: RDB方法被应用于三维紧凑量子电动力学（cQED），在不同耦合强度下都实现了高精度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 经典和量子模拟格点规范理论（LGT）受限于规范自由度的无限维希尔伯特空间，需要新的截断方法。

Method: 本文将新提出的截断方法（RDB）应用于三维cQED，通过张量网络变分计算了不同边界条件下的格点系统的基态，并与先前方法进行了比较。

Result: RDB方法在小格点上实现了比先前方法更高的精度，并且通过张量网络证明了该方法的可扩展性，能够处理更大的格点。

Conclusion: RDB方法为不同耦合强度下的三维cQED提供了一种有效的描述，并且在模拟精度和可扩展性方面都有所提升。

Abstract: The classical and quantum simulation of lattice gauge theories (LGTs) with
Lie groups is hindered by the infinite-dimensional Hilbert space of gauge
degrees of freedom. In a recent work [Phys. Rev. X 15, 031065 (2025)], we
introduced a new truncation scheme -- here renamed as Renormalized Dual Basis
(RDB) -- based on the resolution of the single-plaquette problem, and
demonstrated its performance for SU(2) LGTs. In this paper, we apply the RDB to
compact quantum electrodynamics (cQED) in three spacetime dimensions (2+1D). We
variationally determine the ground state of the theory for small lattices with
periodic (for pure gauge) and open (in presence of fermionic matter) boundary
conditions, achieving improved precision for the plaquette operator compared to
previous approaches. By leveraging tensor networks, we extend the study to
larger lattices and demonstrate the scalability of the method. Overall, we show
that the RDB provides an efficient description across all coupling regimes.

</details>


### [189] [An integrated neural wavefunction solver for spinful Fermi systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18621)
*Alexander Avdoshkin,Max Geier,Liang Fu*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 我们提出了一种解决包含自旋或其他离散自由度以及连续坐标的费米系统的基态问题的方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当哈密顿量包含显式自旋依赖性时，需要进行采样；对于不包含自旋依赖性的哈密顿量，我们发现包含自旋更新可以更快地收敛到反铁磁基态。

Method: 结合使用马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛采样（用于能量估计，我们已将其改编为覆盖扩展的配置空间）和基于 Transformer 的波函数（用于表示费米子态）。

Result: 具有连续位置和离散自旋作为输入的 Transformer 可以通用地逼近自旋相关的广义轨道。我们在各种二维材料问题上验证了该方法：具有 Rashba 自旋-轨道耦合的二维电子气、非共线自旋纹理以及蜂窝状 moir'e 势中的量子反铁磁体。

Conclusion: 该方法为解决多体费米子系统提供了一种有效的方法。

Abstract: We present an approach to solving the ground state of Fermi systems that
contain spin or other discrete degrees of freedom in addition to continuous
coordinates. The approach combines a Markov chain Monte Carlo sampling for
energy estimation that we adapted to cover the extended configuration space
with a transformer-based wavefunction to represent fermionic states. This
sampling is necessary when the Hamiltonian contains explicit spin dependence
and, for spin-independent Hamiltonians, we find that the inclusion of spin
updates leads to faster convergence to an antiferromagnetic ground state. A
transformer with both continuous position and discrete spin as inputs achieves
universal approximation to spinful generalized orbitals. We validate the method
on a range of two-dimensional material problems: a two-dimensional electron gas
with Rashba spin-orbit coupling, a noncollinear spin texture, and a quantum
antiferromagnet in a honeycomb moir\'e potential.

</details>


### [190] [Optimal quantum learning in proximity to universality](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18623)
*Moein N. Ivaki,Matias Karjula,Tapio Ala-Nissila*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 通过引入一个可调的N比特随机电路模型，研究了量子计算机在量子计算中的可模拟性和计算能力之间的界限。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在量子计算的背景下，寻找经典模拟和计算能力优越的量子系统之间的界限，对于识别真正的量子优势至关重要。

Method: 提出了一种可调的N比特随机电路模型，其中一部分Clifford门被非稳定条件T门替换，并研究了该模型在时间处理任务中的表现与纠缠谱统计和长程非稳定资源含量的对应关系，以及在N趋于无穷大时状态反平度的缩放行为。

Result: 发现可训练性和可扩展性可以通过参数p连续控制，从而在经典可处理和最大表达量子动力学之间进行导航。

Conclusion: 该研究为设计强大且可训练的量子机器学习系统提供了一种通用的策略，并阐明了量子计算优势的物理资源。

Abstract: The boundary between classically simulable and computationally superior
quantum systems is fundamental to identifying true quantum advantage. We
investigate this within the framework of quantum reservoir computing by
introducing a tunable $N$-qubit random circuit model, where a fraction $p$ of
Clifford gates are probabilistically substituted with nonstabilizing
conditional-$\hat{T}$ gates. We establish a direct correspondence between the
reservoir's performance on temporal processing tasks and its entanglement
spectrum statistics and long-range nonstabilizer resource content. To assess
scalability, we study the scaling of the anti-flatness of states in the
large-$N$ limit at a fixed circuit depth ratio $d/N \sim \mathcal{O}(1)$. This
is taken as a witness to concentration of measures, a known impediment to
learning in thermalizing systems. We demonstrate that the learnability and
scalability of the reservoir can be continuously controlled by the parameter
$p$, allowing us to navigate from classically tractable to maximally expressive
quantum dynamics. These architecture-agnostic results offer a general strategy
for designing powerful and trainable quantum machine learning systems and
clarify the physical resources underpinning quantum computational advantage.

</details>


### [191] [Measurement-Based Fault-Tolerant Quantum Computation on High-Connectivity Devices: A Resource-Efficient Approach toward Early FTQC](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18652)
