*Yohei Ibe,Yutaka Hirano,Yasuo Ozu,Toru Kawakubo,Keisuke Fujii*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 提出一种测量型容错量子计算（MB-FTQC）架构，适用于高连通性平台（如离子阱和中性原子）。该架构利用已验证的逻辑比特辅助和Knill的纠错隐形传态，避免了重复的表观测量，简化了解码为逻辑Pauli修正，从而降低了经典开销。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了适应近期设备规模，需要一种适用于高连通性平台（如离子阱和中性原子）的测量型容错量子计算（MB-FTQC）架构，该架构应能减少开销并适应不同规模的计算需求。

Method: 提出一种测量型容错量子计算（MB-FTQC）架构，利用已验证的逻辑比特辅助和Knill的纠错隐形传态。通过两种实现方式进行了基准测试：1. 基于Steane码，使用模拟Rz(θ)旋转，目标是实现百万T门（~10^6 T gates）的计算能力。2. 基于Golay码，使用高阶零级魔态蒸馏，目标是实现十亿T门（~10^9 T gates）的计算能力。

Result: 在物理错误率为p=10^-4的情况下，Steane码路径支持5x10^4次逻辑Rz(θ)旋转（约等于2.4x10^6次T门），可实现百万T门规模的计算。使用约2240个物理量子比特，可达到log2(QV)=64。Golay码路径支持超过2x10^9次T门，可实现十亿T门规模的计算。

Conclusion: 所提出的MB-FTQC架构能够在近期的高连通性硬件上实现实用的、大规模的量子计算，而无需依赖资源密集型的表面码或复杂的码复合。该架构为实现百万和十亿T门规模的量子计算提供了可行的路径。

Abstract: We propose a measurement-based FTQC (MB-FTQC) architecture for
high-connectivity platforms such as trapped ions and neutral atoms. The key
idea is to use verified logical ancillas combined with Knill's error-correcting
teleportation, eliminating repeated syndrome measurements and simplifying
decoding to logical Pauli corrections, thus keeping classical overhead low. To
align with near-term device scales, we present two implementations benchmarked
under circuit-level depolarizing noise: (i) a Steane-code version that uses
analog $R_Z(\theta)$ rotations, akin to the STAR architecture [Akahoshi et al.,
PRX Quantum 5, 010337], aiming for the megaquop regime ($\sim 10^6$ $T$ gates)
on devices with thousands of qubits; and (ii) a Golay-code version with
higher-order zero-level magic-state distillation, targeting the gigaquop regime
($\sim 10^9$ $T$ gates) on devices with tens of thousands of qubits. At a
physical error rate $p=10^{-4}$, the Steane path supports $5\times 10^{4}$
logical $R_Z(\theta)$ rotations, corresponding to $\sim 2.4\times 10^{6}$ $T$
gates and enabling megaquop-scale computation. With about $2{,}240$ physical
qubits, it achieves $\log_{2}\mathrm{QV}=64$. The Golay path supports more than
$2\times 10^{9}$ $T$ gates, enabling gigaquop-scale computation. These results
suggest that our architecture can deliver practical large-scale quantum
computation on near-term high-connectivity hardware without relying on
resource-intensive surface codes or complex code concatenation.

</details>


### [192] [Lyapunov-Aware Quantum-Inspired Reinforcement Learning for Continuous-Time Vehicle Control: A Feasibility Study](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18852)
*Nutkritta Kraipatthanapong,Natthaphat Thathong,Pannita Suksawas,Thanunnut Klunklin,Kritin Vongthonglua,Krit Attahakul,Aueaphum Aueawatthanaphisut*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一个名为LQRL的新框架，它结合了量子策略优化和Lyapunov稳定性分析，用于连续时间车辆控制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在动态环境中，需要确保车辆控制的安全性、收敛性和稳定性，特别是在连续状态的强化学习任务中。

Method: 该方法将变分量子电路（VQC）的表示能力与面向稳定性的策略梯度机制相结合，构建了一个量子策略网络，该网络在Lyapunov稳定性约束下生成控制动作。

Result: 在自适应巡航控制场景的仿真实验中，LQRL框架成功地将Lyapunov稳定性验证嵌入到量子策略学习中，实现了可解释且面向稳定性的控制性能。虽然在剧烈加速时出现了瞬态超调和Lyapunov发散，但系统状态仍然保持有界。

Conclusion: LQRL框架为在自动驾驶系统和混合量子-经典优化领域实现可证明安全的量子控制奠定了基础，证明了在量子强化学习架构中集成安全保障的可行性。

Abstract: This paper presents a novel Lyapunov-Based Quantum Reinforcement Learning
(LQRL) framework that integrates quantum policy optimization with Lyapunov
stability analysis for continuous-time vehicle control. The proposed approach
combines the representational power of variational quantum circuits (VQCs) with
a stability-aware policy gradient mechanism to ensure asymptotic convergence
and safe decision-making under dynamic environments. The vehicle longitudinal
control problem was formulated as a continuous-state reinforcement learning
task, where the quantum policy network generates control actions subject to
Lyapunov stability constraints. Simulation experiments were conducted in a
closed-loop adaptive cruise control scenario using a quantum-inspired policy
trained under stability feedback. The results demonstrate that the LQRL
framework successfully embeds Lyapunov stability verification into quantum
policy learning, enabling interpretable and stability-aware control
performance. Although transient overshoot and Lyapunov divergence were observed
under aggressive acceleration, the system maintained bounded state evolution,
validating the feasibility of integrating safety guarantees within quantum
reinforcement learning architectures. The proposed framework provides a
foundational step toward provably safe quantum control in autonomous systems
and hybrid quantum-classical optimization domains.

</details>


### [193] [Source-device-independent monolithically integrated QRNG in a black box with generation rate in excess of 30 Gbit/s](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18700)
*Peter Seigo Kincaid,Lorenzo De Marinis,Francesco Testa,Nicola Andriolli,Giampiero Contestabile*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 一个基于InP光子集成电路的量子真空态熵源，结合外差相干探测和光学本地振荡器，实现了35 Gbit/s的生成速率，并提供了安全、紧凑且快速的量子随机数生成器，适用于量子密钥分发等领域。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提供一种安全、紧凑且快速的量子随机数生成器，适用于量子密钥分发等领域。

Method: 基于InP光子集成电路，利用量子真空态熵源，通过外差相干探测和光学本地振荡器进行采样。

Result: 实现了35 Gbit/s的生成速率，设备集成在一个黑盒中，包含驱动和信号调节电子设备，并提供电接口。

Conclusion: 该设备展示了安全性、紧凑性和快速生成速率，使其成为量子密钥分发等应用的理想选择。

Abstract: Quantum mechanics provides a secure means of generating random numbers, with
applications in fields spanning scientific simulation to cryptography. The
first source-device-independent monolithically integrated quantum random number
generator is reported. With a generation rate of 35 Gbit/s, the device is based
on an InP photonic integrated circuit with a quantum vacuum state entropy
source, sampled by heterodyne coherent detection using an optical local
oscillator. The entire device is conveniently housed in a black box and
includes all the necessary driving and signal conditioning electronics, with
electrical interfaces only; the exhibited security, compactness, and fast
generation rate make the generator suitable for applications in QKD.

</details>


### [194] [Practical Use Cases of Neutral Atoms Quantum Computers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18732)
*Matteo Grotti,Sara Marzella,Gabriella Bettonte,Daniele Ottaviani,Elisa Ercolessi*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Rydberg相互作用的量子计算机因其可扩展性、连接灵活性以及在组合优化方面的适用性而受到关注。本文概述了它们的最新硬件进展、优化技术、在量子模拟（包括组合优化、多体模型、化学和药物）、机器学习和组合优化中的应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子计算已成为一种革命性的范式，有望在广泛的领域带来更强的计算能力和算法效率。在中，基于Rydberg相互作用的中性原子量子处理器因其可扩展性、量子比特连接灵活性以及在解决组合优化挑战方面的内在适用性而受到越来越多的关注。

Method: 本文概述了中性原子量子计算机的现有能力、标准和应用。首先讨论了最近的硬件进展和寄存器映射优化技术，以提高电路保真度和性能。随后，回顾了它们在经典和量子硬问题（如MIS和QUBO问题、量子多体模型以及化学和药物学中的分子）中的量子模拟器应用。还涵盖了在增强机器学习方面的应用。

Result: 本文的重点是中性原子量子计算机的硬件进展、优化技术和各种应用，包括量子模拟（MIS、QUBO、多体模型、化学、药物）和机器学习。

Conclusion: Rydberg相互作用的中性原子量子计算机在解决组合优化和模拟复杂系统方面具有巨大潜力，并且在量子模拟和机器学习等领域展现了广泛的应用前景。

Abstract: Quantum computing has quickly emerged as a revolutionary paradigm that holds
the potential for greatly enhanced computational capability and algorithmic
efficiency, in a wide range of areas. Among the various hardware platforms,
neutral atom quantum processors based on Rydberg interactions are gaining
increasing interest because of their scalability, qubit-connection flexibility,
and intrinsic appropriateness for solving combinatorial optimization
challenges. This paper provides an overview of the present capabilities,
standards, and applications of neutral atom quantum computers. We first discuss
recent hardware advancements and register mapping optimization techniques that
enhance circuit fidelity and performance. We next review their uses as quantum
simulators, in both classical and quantum hard problems, such as MIS and QUBO
problems, quantum many-body models and molecules in chemistry and pharmacology.
Applications for enhancing machine learning are also covered.

</details>


### [195] [Simple logical quantum computation with concatenated symplectic double codes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18753)
*Noah Berthusen,Elijah Durso-Sabina*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: The paper introduces concatenated symplectic double codes, which enable efficient implementation of Clifford gates using simple circuits and physical single-qubit gates, showing promising performance for quantum computing.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: While quantum error correcting codes are advancing for quantum memories, fault-tolerant logical gates are less studied and often complex. This paper addresses this gap by investigating a new type of code.

Method: The paper utilizes the symplectic double construction to investigate concatenated symplectic double codes. They implement logical gates using physical single-qubit gates and qubit relabeling, combined with an injected logical phase gate to achieve the Clifford group. Circuit-level simulations are performed to assess performance.

Result: The study found that concatenated symplectic double codes allow for the implementation of the full Clifford group through a simple circuit. Simulations show promising performance even at near state-of-the-art physical error rates.

Conclusion: Concatenated symplectic double codes are presented as strong candidates for the underlying computational code in medium- to large-scale quantum computers due to their efficient gate implementation and robust error correction capabilities.

Abstract: There have been significant recent advances in constructing theoretical and
practical quantum error correcting codes that function well as quantum
memories; however, performing fault-tolerant logical gates on these codes is
less studied, and the protocols that do exist often require significant
complexity. Building off the symplectic double construction, we investigate
concatenated symplectic double codes, which have a rich set of logical gates
implementable using only physical single-qubit gates and qubit relabeling.
Combined with an injected logical phase gate, the full Clifford group on a
single codeblock is achieved through a functionally simple circuit. We perform
circuit-level simulations of state preparation and quantum error correction on
these codes and show that they have promising performance at near
state-of-the-art physical error rates. As such, we argue that concatenated
symplectic double codes are strong contenders as the underlying computational
code on medium- to large-scale quantum computers.

</details>


### [196] [Growth and collapse of subsystem complexity under random unitary circuits](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18805)
*Jeongwan Haah,Douglas Stanford*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 随机酉电路动力学中子系统密度矩阵的复杂性随时间演化，对于较小子系统，其复杂性随时间线性增长然后衰减；对于较大子系统，其复杂性随时间线性增长直至指数级久远。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究混沌量子动力学中，缩减密度矩阵的复杂性如何随时间演化，特别关注初始全局态为乘积态的情况。

Method: 定义状态复杂性为从乘积态近似生成给定状态所需的最小局部量子通道数量，并研究了1+1维中不同长度子系统（小于一半和大于一半）的复杂性随时间T的变化，以及利用全息对应关系进行研究。

Result: 对于长度小于一半的子系统，其复杂性随时间T线性增长，至少达到T = ℓ / 4，但在大局部维度极限下，在T = ℓ / 2之后变为零。对于长度大于一半的互补子系统，其复杂性随时间线性增长直至指数级久远。全息对应关系表明，较小子系统的状态复杂性应线性增长至 T = ℓ / 2，然后突然衰减至零。

Conclusion: 缩减密度矩阵的复杂性在混沌量子动力学中表现出与子系统大小和时间演化相关的复杂行为，并且全息对应关系提供了对这种复杂性动态的进一步见解。

Abstract: For chaotic quantum dynamics modeled by random unitary circuits, we study the
complexity of reduced density matrices of subsystems as a function of evolution
time where the initial global state is a product state. The state complexity is
defined as the minimum number of local quantum channels to generate a given
state from a product state to a good approximation. In $1+1$d, we prove that
the complexity of subsystems of length $\ell$ smaller than half grows linearly
in time $T$ at least up to $T = \ell / 4$ but becomes zero after time $T = \ell
/2$ in the limit of a large local dimension, while the complexity of the
complementary subsystem of length larger than half grows linearly in time up to
exponentially late times. Using holographic correspondence, we give some
evidence that the state complexity of the smaller subsystem should actually
grow linearly up to time $T = \ell/2$ and then abruptly decay to zero.

</details>


### [197] [Classical Representation for Quantum States of a Particle in $λ z^{2m}$ potential](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18809)
*Tasko Grozdanov,Evgeni Solov'ev*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: A classical representation for quantum eigenstates of a particle in $\\lambda z^{2m}$ potentials is developed using ensembles of classical trajectories with specific energy distributions. The corresponding Schr"odinger equation is analyzed.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: To develop a classical representation for quantum eigenstates of a particle bound in $\\lambda z^{2m}$ potentials.

Method: Developed a classical representation using ensembles of classical trajectories with energy distributions that can take on negative values, have integrable singularities at zero energy (for m>1), and whose mean energies coincide with quantum eigenenergies. Analyzed the corresponding Schr"odinger equation.

Result: A classical representation for quantum eigenstates has been developed. The energy distributions have specific properties (negative values, singularities, matching mean energies). The Schr"odinger equation in this classical representation has been analyzed.

Conclusion: The classical representation developed provides a new perspective on quantum eigenstates for the specified potentials, with the energy distributions exhibiting unique characteristics and the Schr"odinger equation being analyzed within this framework.

Abstract: A classical representation for quantum eigenstates of a particle bound in
$\lambda z^{2m}$ $(\lambda >0, m=1,2,...)$ potentials is developed. It is
represented by ensembles of classical trajectories with energy distributions
that can take on negative values, for $m>1$ have integrable singularities at
zero energy and whose mean energies coincide with quantum eigenenergies. The
corresponding Schr\"odinger equation in classical representation is analyzed.

</details>


### [198] [Dephasing through Bremsstrahlung emission: insights from quantum Boltzmann equation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18833)
*Hassan Manshouri,Moslem Zarei*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究利用量子场论和量子玻尔兹曼方程研究开放量子系统中的退相干机制，重点关注Bremsstrahlung辐射导致的退相干。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究开放量子系统中的退相干机制，特别是Bremsstrahlung辐射的影响。

Method: 应用量子场论技术和量子玻尔兹曼方程，对Stern-Gerlach干涉仪中的费米子-光子相互作用进行建模，并分析其诱导的退相位因子。

Result: 模型能够准确地模拟Bremsstrahlung辐射引起的退相干，并将结果与经典Bremsstrahlung进行了比较。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的方法在理解退相干方面取得了显著进展，并对量子传感和原子干涉测量等领域的潜在应用具有重要意义。

Abstract: We investigate decoherence mechanisms in open quantum systems using quantum
field theory techniques and the quantum Boltzmann equation. Specifically, we
focus on decoherence through Bremsstrahlung emission, a fundamental process in
quantum electrodynamics leading to coherence loss. By applying quantum field
theory techniques and quantum Boltzmann equation, we model the fermion-photon
interaction in the Stern-Gerlach interferometer and analyze the induced
dephasing factor. Our approach offers significant advancements in understanding
decoherence and its potential applications in quantum sensing and atomic
interferometry. We demonstrate the accuracy of our method by comparing results
to classical Bremsstrahlung.

</details>


### [199] [Surface code scaling on heavy-hex superconducting quantum processors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18847)
*Arian Vezvaee,Cesar Benito,Mario Morford-Oberst,Alejandro Bermudez,Daniel A. Lidar*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: IBM 重六角形处理器上的表面码量子内存子阈值缩放


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在原生连接不匹配代码的硬件上演示表面码量子内存的子阈值缩放是一个核心挑战。

Method: 通过共同设计代码嵌入和控制来解决：一种使用桥接辅助器的深度最小化基于 SWAP 的“折叠-展开”嵌入，以及鲁棒的、间隙感知的动力学解耦 (DD)。

Result: 在 Heron 代设备上，从均匀距离 3 代码各向异性缩放到各向异性距离 (dx,dz) = (3,5) 和 (5,3) 代码。发现增加 dz (dx) 可以改善跨多个量子纠错周期的 Z 基 (X 基) 逻辑状态的保护。DD 在抑制相干 ZZ 串扰和非马尔可夫去相干方面发挥着重要作用。推导了一个新的纠缠保真度指标，该指标直接从 X 和 Z 基逻辑错误数据计算得出，并提供每个周期的 SPAM 感知边界。

Conclusion: 尽管尚未实现任意逻辑初始状态的全局子阈值代码缩放，但通过对硬件进行微小改进即可实现。结果通过在非原生架构上集成 QEC 和优化的 DD，为在有偏见的非马尔可夫噪声下进行鲁棒的子阈值表面码缩放测试确立了一条具体途径。

Abstract: Demonstrating subthreshold scaling of a surface-code quantum memory on
hardware whose native connectivity does not match the code remains a central
challenge. We address this on IBM heavy-hex superconducting processors by
co-designing the code embedding and control: a depth-minimizing SWAP-based
"fold-unfold" embedding that uses bridge ancillas, together with robust,
gap-aware dynamical decoupling (DD). On Heron-generation devices we perform
anisotropic scaling from a uniform distance 3 code to anisotropic distance
(dx,dz) = (3,5) and (5,3) codes. We find that increasing dz (dx) improves the
protection of Z-basis (X-basis) logical states across multiple quantum error
correction cycles. Even if global subthreshold code scaling for arbitrary
logical initial states is not yet achieved, we argue that it is within reach
with minor hardware improvements. We show that DD plays a major role: it
suppresses coherent ZZ crosstalk and non-Markovian dephasing that accumulate
during idle gaps on heavy-hex layouts, and it eliminates spurious subthreshold
claims that arise when scaled codes without DD are compared against smaller
codes with DD. To quantify performance, we derive an entanglement fidelity
metric that is computed directly from X- and Z-basis logical-error data and
provides per-cycle, SPAM-aware bounds. The entanglement fidelity metric reveals
that widely used single-parameter fits used to compute suppression factors can
mischaracterize or obscure code performance when their assumptions are
violated; we identify the strong assumptions of stationarity, unitality, and
negligible logical SPAM required for those fits to be valid and show that they
do not hold for our data. Our results establish a concrete path to robust tests
of subthreshold surface-code scaling under biased, non-Markovian noise by
integrating QEC with optimized DD on non-native architectures.

</details>


### [200] [Weight-dependent and weight-independent measures of quantum incompatibility in multiparameter estimation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18864)
*Jiayu He,Gabriele Fazio,Matteo G. A. Paris*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子兼容性是多参数量子估计的挑战。本文引入了两个标量度量 R 和 T[W] 来量化这种不兼容性，并提供了基于这些度量的界限。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 多参数量子估计面临基本挑战，因为不同参数的最优测量固有不兼容，这是量子非对易性的直接结果。

Method: 通过引入和对比两个标量度量（权重无关的量子度量 R 和权重依赖的度量 T[W]）来分析不兼容性。推导了基于这些度量的界限的层次结构，并得到了它们的饱和条件。通过对可调谐量子比特和 qutrit 模型进行解析和数值研究，验证了 T[W] 度量。

Result: 权重依赖的界限 C_{T}[W] 通常比 R 度量 C_{R}[W] 更接近 Holevo 界限 C_{H}[W]，尤其是在更高维度的系统中。开发了一种基于 C_{T}[W] 分析计算 C_{H}[W] 的方法。

Conclusion: 权重矩阵的结构在决定多参数量子计量学的精度极限方面起着至关重要的作用。

Abstract: Multiparameter quantum estimation faces a fundamental challenge due to the
inherent incompatibility of optimal measurements for different parameters, a
direct consequence of quantum non-commutativity. This incompatibility is
quantified by the gap between the symmetric logarithmic derivative (SLD)
quantum Cram\'er-Rao bound, which is not always attainable, and the
asymptotically achievable Holevo bound. This work provides a comprehensive
analysis of this gap by introducing and contrasting two scalar measures. The
first is the weight-independent quantumness measure $R$, which captures the
intrinsic incompatibility of the estimation model. The second is a tighter,
weight-dependent measure $T[W]$ which explicitly incorporates the cost matrix
$W$ assigning relative importance to different parameters. We establish a
hierarchy of bounds based on these two measures and derive necessary and
sufficient conditions for their saturation. Through analytical and numerical
studies of tunable qubit and qutrit models with SU(2) unitary encoding, we
demonstrate that the weight-dependent bound $C_{T}[W]$ often provides a
significantly tighter approximation to the Holevo bound $C_{H}[W]$ than the
$R$-dependent bound, especially in higher-dimensional systems. We also develop
an approach based on $C_{T}[W]$ to compute the Holevo bound $C_{H}[W]$
analytically. Our results highlight the critical role of the weight matrix's
structure in determining the precision limits of multiparameter quantum
metrology.

</details>


<div id='cs.NE'></div>

# cs.NE [[Back]](#toc)

### [201] [Neural networks for neurocomputing circuits: a computational study of tolerance to noise and activation function non-uniformity when machine learning materials properties](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17849)
*Ye min Thant,Methawee Nukunudompanich,Chu-Chen Chueh,Manabu Ihara,Sergei Manzhos*

Main category: cs.NE

TL;DR: 数字计算在处理机器学习任务时功耗和效率方面存在局限性，而模拟神经计算电路则提供了潜在的解决方案。然而，模拟电路固有的噪声和神经激活函数（NAF）的不均匀性对神经网络（NN）的性能构成了挑战。本研究通过计算方法探讨了这些因素对不同NN架构和训练方案的影响，并以材料信息学中的三个代表性问题为例进行了说明。研究表明，NN普遍对噪声敏感，模型精度随噪声水平升高而迅速下降。单隐藏层NN和尺寸大于最优值的NN对噪声的容忍度稍高。过拟合程度较低（不一定是测试集误差最低）的模型对噪声的容忍度更高。更重要的是，研究证明，通过使用实际实现的NAF形状对NN进行再训练，可以减轻NAF不均匀性的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的数字计算机在处理机器学习（ML）任务时，在功耗和效率方面存在局限性，特别是在资源受限或极端环境下。模拟神经计算电路为解决这些问题提供了前景，但其固有的噪声和神经激活函数（NAF）的不均匀性对神经网络（NN）的性能构成了挑战。因此，理解并缓解这些因素对NN性能的影响至关重要。

Method: 本研究采用计算方法，系统地研究了电路噪声和NAF不均匀性对不同NN架构和训练方案的影响。研究重点关注材料信息学领域的应用，选取了三个代表性问题：基于石化烃形成能与最低能量异构体的ML、双钙钛矿的形成能与带隙预测，以及QM9数据集中的分子零点振动能量预测。通过实验和分析，评估了不同因素对模型准确性的影响，并探索了缓解策略。

Result: 研究结果表明，神经网络普遍对噪声的容忍度较低，随着噪声水平的增加，模型精度迅速下降。单隐藏层神经网络和尺寸大于最优值的神经网络对噪声的容忍度略高。此外，过拟合程度较低的模型（不一定是测试集误差最低的模型）对噪声的容忍度更高。最重要的是，研究证明，通过使用实际实现的NAF形状对神经网络进行再训练，可以有效缓解NAF不均匀性带来的负面影响。

Conclusion: 电路噪声和NAF不均匀性是影响模拟神经计算电路中神经网络性能的关键因素。虽然神经网络普遍对噪声敏感，但可以通过选择合适的网络架构（如单隐藏层或稍大的网络尺寸）和训练策略（如减少过拟合）来提高其噪声容忍度。更重要的是，通过使用实际电路中观察到的NAF形状进行再训练，可以有效地减轻NAF不均匀性的不利影响，为在实际模拟神经计算硬件上部署高性能神经网络提供了可行途径。

Abstract: Dedicated analog neurocomputing circuits are promising for high-throughput,
low power consumption applications of machine learning (ML) and for
applications where implementing a digital computer is unwieldy (remote
locations; small, mobile, and autonomous devices, extreme conditions, etc.).
Neural networks (NN) implemented in such circuits, however, must contend with
circuit noise and the non-uniform shapes of the neuron activation function
(NAF) due to the dispersion of performance characteristics of circuit elements
(such as transistors or diodes implementing the neurons). We present a
computational study of the impact of circuit noise and NAF inhomogeneity in
function of NN architecture and training regimes. We focus on one application
that requires high-throughput ML: materials informatics, using as
representative problem ML of formation energies vs. lowest-energy isomer of
peri-condensed hydrocarbons, formation energies and band gaps of double
perovskites, and zero point vibrational energies of molecules from QM9 dataset.
We show that NNs generally possess low noise tolerance with the model accuracy
rapidly degrading with noise level. Single-hidden layer NNs, and NNs with
larger-than-optimal sizes are somewhat more noise-tolerant. Models that show
less overfitting (not necessarily the lowest test set error) are more
noise-tolerant. Importantly, we demonstrate that the effect of activation
function inhomogeneity can be palliated by retraining the NN using practically
realized shapes of NAFs.

</details>


### [202] [A Survey of Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17867)
*Jian-wei Liu,Bing-rong Xu,Zhi-yan Song*

Main category: cs.NE

TL;DR: 本文详细分类了递归神经网络和循环神经网络的分支，涵盖了通用、结构化和其他三类，并探讨了它们在解决复杂序列、语音和图像问题中的应用及未来发展。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 对递归神经网络和循环神经网络的分支进行详细分类，并探讨它们在解决复杂序列、语音和图像问题中的研究进展和应用。

Method: 对递归神经网络和循环神经网络根据网络结构、训练目标函数和学习算法实现进行分类，并详细描述了各模型的原理、结构、模型变形、研究进展和应用。

Result: 本文详细介绍了递归神经网络和循环神经网络的三大类分支，包括了具体的模型，并描述了它们的研究进展和应用，最后对递归和循环神经网络模型进行了展望和总结。

Conclusion: 递归神经网络和循环神经网络模型在解决复杂序列、语音和图像问题中发挥着重要作用，并且随着各种网络的发展和融合，未来具有广阔的应用前景。

Abstract: In this paper, the branches of recursive and recurrent neural networks are
classified in detail according to the network structure, training objective
function and learning algorithm implementation. They are roughly divided into
three categories: The first category is General Recursive and Recurrent Neural
Networks, including Basic Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Long Short
Term Memory Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Convolutional Recursive
and Recurrent Neural Networks, Differential Recursive and Recurrent Neural
Networks, One-Layer Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, High-Order
Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Highway Networks, Multidimensional
Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Bidirectional Recursive and Recurrent
Neural Networks; the second category is Structured Recursive and Recurrent
Neural Networks, including Grid Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Graph
Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Temporal Recursive and Recurrent
Neural Networks, Lattice Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Hierarchical
Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks, Tree Recursive and Recurrent Neural
Networks; the third category is Other Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks,
including Array Long Short Term Memory, Nested and Stacked Recursive and
Recurrent Neural Networks, Memory Recursive and Recurrent Neural Networks.
Various networks cross each other and even rely on each other to form a complex
network of relationships. In the context of the development and convergence of
various networks, many complex sequence, speech and image problems are solved.
After a detailed description of the principle and structure of the above model
and model deformation, the research progress and application of each model are
described, and finally the recursive and recurrent neural network models are
prospected and summarized.

</details>


### [203] [Decoding Listeners Identity: Person Identification from EEG Signals Using a Lightweight Spiking Transformer](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17879)
*Zheyuan Lin,Siqi Cai,Haizhou Li*

Main category: cs.NE

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于脉冲神经网络（SNN）和轻量级脉冲Transformer的新型EEG个体识别方法，提高了效率和有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有技术计算成本高，限制了EEG个体识别的应用范围。

Method: 利用脉冲神经网络（SNN）和轻量级脉冲Transformer来处理EEG信号的时间复杂性。

Result: 在EEG-音乐情绪识别挑战数据集上，该模型实现了100%的分类准确率，同时能耗不到传统深度神经网络的10%。

Conclusion: 该研究为开发高能效、高性能的BCI提供了一个有前景的方向。

Abstract: EEG-based person identification enables applications in security,
personalized brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), and cognitive monitoring.
However, existing techniques often rely on deep learning architectures at high
computational cost, limiting their scope of applications. In this study, we
propose a novel EEG person identification approach using spiking neural
networks (SNNs) with a lightweight spiking transformer for efficiency and
effectiveness. The proposed SNN model is capable of handling the temporal
complexities inherent in EEG signals. On the EEG-Music Emotion Recognition
Challenge dataset, the proposed model achieves 100% classification accuracy
with less than 10% energy consumption of traditional deep neural networks. This
study offers a promising direction for energy-efficient and high-performance
BCIs. The source code is available at
https://github.com/PatrickZLin/Decode-ListenerIdentity.

</details>


### [204] [Self-Evidencing Through Hierarchical Gradient Decomposition: A Dissipative System That Maintains Non-Equilibrium Steady-State by Minimizing Variational Free Energy](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17916)
*Michael James McCulloch*

Main category: cs.NE

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个实现自由能原理（FEP）的具体算法，通过局部信用分配机制，将梯度计算分层实现，并在多个连续控制任务上进行了验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 自由能原理（FEP）作为一种自组织系统持久性的基本原则，但缺乏具体的实现算法。

Method: 提出了一种通过精确局部信用分配来实现FEP的构造性证明。该方法将梯度计算分层化：空间信用通过反馈对齐实现，时间信用通过遗忘追踪实现，结构信用通过营养场图（TFM）估计连接块的梯度幅度。

Result: TFM与Oracle梯度的皮尔逊相关系数达到0.9693，证明了该方法的精确性。该方法在任务干扰后实现了98.6%的保留率，从75%的结构损伤中自主恢复，实现了自组织临界性（谱半径p≈1.0），并在没有回放缓冲区的情况下，在连续控制任务上实现了样本高效的强化学习。

Conclusion: 该架构统一了Prigogine耗散结构、Friston自由能最小化和Hopfield吸引子动力学，表明可以通过局部、生物学上可行的规则来实现网络拓扑的精确分层推理。

Abstract: The Free Energy Principle (FEP) states that self-organizing systems must
minimize variational free energy to persist, but the path from principle to
implementable algorithm has remained unclear. We present a constructive proof
that the FEP can be realized through exact local credit assignment. The system
decomposes gradient computation hierarchically: spatial credit via feedback
alignment, temporal credit via eligibility traces, and structural credit via a
Trophic Field Map (TFM) that estimates expected gradient magnitude for each
connection block. We prove these mechanisms are exact at their respective
levels and validate the central claim empirically: the TFM achieves 0.9693
Pearson correlation with oracle gradients. This exactness produces emergent
capabilities including 98.6% retention after task interference, autonomous
recovery from 75% structural damage, self-organized criticality (spectral
radius p ~= 1.0$), and sample-efficient reinforcement learning on continuous
control tasks without replay buffers. The architecture unifies Prigogine's
dissipative structures, Friston's free energy minimization, and Hopfield's
attractor dynamics, demonstrating that exact hierarchical inference over
network topology can be implemented with local, biologically plausible rules.

</details>

# cs.MA [[Back]](#toc)

### [205] [TACLA: An LLM-Based Multi-Agent Tool for Transactional Analysis Training in Education](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17913)
*Monika Zamojska,Jarosław A. Chudziak*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: TACLA是一个新的多智能体架构，利用交易分析（TA）原则来模拟具有心理深度的LLM代理，在教育场景中得到验证，能够进行真实的社会互动模拟。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: LLM在模拟细致的人类社交动态方面存在挑战，尤其是在心理深度和保持一致的个性行为方面，这对于高保真的培训工具至关重要。

Method: TACLA（交易分析情境LLM智能体）将TA的核心原则整合到一个多智能体架构中，将智能体建模为具有自身模式记忆的独立父体、成人体和子体自我状态的协调系统。协调器智能体根据情境触发器和智能体的生命脚本来优先激活自我状态，以确保产生心理上真实的反应。

Result: 在教育场景中进行的验证表明，TACLA能够真实地模拟学生智能体的自我状态转移，并根据不同的教师干预策略有效地模拟冲突的降级和升级。对话可信度高，证实了TACLA在创造动态的、以心理为基础的社会模拟方面的能力。

Conclusion: TACLA通过整合TA原则，成功克服了LLM在模拟具有心理深度的社交动态方面的局限性，能够生成具有心理深度的、动态的社会模拟，为教育等领域的AI工具开发提供了新的途径。

Abstract: Simulating nuanced human social dynamics with Large Language Models (LLMs)
remains a significant challenge, particularly in achieving psychological depth
and consistent persona behavior crucial for high-fidelity training tools. This
paper introduces TACLA (Transactional Analysis Contextual LLM-based Agents), a
novel Multi-Agent architecture designed to overcome these limitations. TACLA
integrates core principles of Transactional Analysis (TA) by modeling agents as
an orchestrated system of distinct Parent, Adult, and Child ego states, each
with its own pattern memory. An Orchestrator Agent prioritizes ego state
activation based on contextual triggers and an agent's life script, ensuring
psychologically authentic responses. Validated in an educational scenario,
TACLA demonstrates realistic ego state shifts in Student Agents, effectively
modeling conflict de-escalation and escalation based on different teacher
intervention strategies. Evaluation shows high conversational credibility and
confirms TACLA's capacity to create dynamic, psychologically-grounded social
simulations, advancing the development of effective AI tools for education and
beyond.

</details>


### [206] [Adaptive Coopetition: Leveraging Coarse Verifier Signals for Resilient Multi-Agent LLM Reasoning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18179)
*Rui Jerry Huang,Wendy Liu,Anastasia Miin*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: LLM推理中的计算是提升模型能力的关键，但现有方法存在局限性。本文提出了一种名为AdCo的新型推理时框架，通过自适应的“合作-竞争”机制，在粗略的验证器信号指导下，使LLM代理能够根据同伴反馈迭代地优化推理过程，从而提高了数学推理的性能和鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有LLM推理技术，如自纠错和多智能体协作（MAC），存在收敛到初始偏见、协调机制缺乏导致集体错误以及需要大量训练数据的验证器等问题。本研究旨在解决这些挑战。

Method: 提出了一种名为AdCo（Adaptive Coopetition）的新型推理时框架。在该框架中，LLM代理利用一种基于UCB（Upper Confidence Bound）的自适应“合作-竞争”机制。在每个推理轮次，代理们根据粗略的验证器信号来决定协作或竞争，并通过同伴反馈迭代地优化其推理过程。该方法不依赖于高性能的验证器。

Result: 在数学推理基准测试中，AdCo框架取得了显著的性能提升，在更具挑战性的数据集上比基线方法提高了20%。此外，该方法在不同样本量和配置下均表现出鲁棒性和一致性。

Conclusion: AdCo框架通过利用模型知识多样性和推理轨迹度量，并促进由不确定性驱动的探索（尤其是在参与者能力相当时），增强了推理的鲁棒性。该研究为推理时计算提供了一个新的视角，并为构建更具韧性的多智能体LLM系统铺平了道路。

Abstract: Inference-time computation is a critical yet challenging paradigm for
enhancing the reasoning performance of large language models (LLMs). While
existing strategies improve reasoning stability and consistency, they suffer
from notable limitations: self-correction often reinforces the model's initial
biases, and Multi-Agent Collaboration (MAC) often fails due to the lack of
efficient coordination mechanisms, leading to collective errors. Although
high-performing verifiers can detect reasoning errors, making them reliable
requires substantial training. To address these challenges, we introduce a
novel inference-time framework, Adaptive Coopetition (AdCo), in which LLM
agents utilize an adaptive, UCB-based "coopetition" mechanism. At each round,
agents leverage coarse verifier signals to determine whether to collaborate or
compete, and iteratively refine their reasoning based on peer feedback. Without
relying on high-performance verifiers, our adaptive strategy achieves
significant performance gains on mathematical reasoning benchmarks, yielding a
20% relative improvement over baselines on the more challenging dataset. Our
approach remains robust and consistent in terms of accuracy under different
sample sizes and configurations. This adaptive, signal-guided "coopetition"
framework enhances reasoning robustness by leveraging both model knowledge
diversity and reasoning trace measures, while also promoting uncertainty-driven
exploration, especially when participants have comparable capabilities. From
this perspective, our work offers a fresh lens on inference-time computation
and paves the way for more resilient multi-agent LLM systems. Our code is
available at: https://github.com/AdCo-Research/adaptive-coopetition.

</details>


### [207] [The Emergence of Complex Behavior in Large-Scale Ecological Environments](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18221)
*Joseph Bejjani,Chase Van Amburg,Chengrui Wang,Chloe Huangyuan Su,Sarah M. Pratt,Yasin Mazloumi,Naeem Khoshnevis,Sham M. Kakade,Kianté Brantley*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: We study how physical scale and population size influence the emergence of complex behaviors in evolving agents within an open-ended ecological environment. Agents evolve through reproduction, mutation, and natural selection, shaping both the environment and the population dynamically without explicit rewards or objectives. The research focuses on the natural emergence and evolution of behaviors under competitive and survival pressures, rather than optimizing a single policy. Experiments were conducted in large-scale worlds with over 60,000 agents, revealing emergent behaviors like long-range resource extraction, vision-based foraging, and predation. The study found that larger environmental scales and populations are necessary for some behaviors to emerge and that increased scale enhances behavioral stability. The findings suggest that ecology can be a valuable tool for machine learning, especially with ample computational resources.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The motivation is to explore how complex behaviors emerge and evolve in open-ended ecological environments, driven by factors like physical scale and population size, without explicit rewards or learning objectives, focusing on the dynamics of natural competition and environmental pressures.

Method: The method involves evolving agents in large-scale virtual worlds (up to 60,000 agents) where they reproduce, mutate, and undergo natural selection. These agents possess evolved neural network policies and dynamically shape their environment and population. The study systematically varies environmental scale and population size to observe the emergence and stability of behaviors.

Result: Emergent behaviors such as long-range resource extraction, vision-based foraging, and predation were identified. The study found that certain behaviors only emerge in sufficiently large environments and populations, and that increasing the scale leads to greater behavioral stability and consistency.

Conclusion: The study concludes that physical scale and population size are crucial for the emergence of complex behaviors in evolving agents. Larger scales foster more stable and consistent emergent behaviors, suggesting that ecological simulations are a promising avenue for machine learning research, particularly given the availability of significant computational power. The research provides new directions for using ecology as a tool in machine learning.

Abstract: We explore how physical scale and population size shape the emergence of
complex behaviors in open-ended ecological environments. In our setting, agents
are unsupervised and have no explicit rewards or learning objectives but
instead evolve over time according to reproduction, mutation, and natural
selection. As they act, agents also shape their environment and the population
around them in an ongoing dynamic ecology. Our goal is not to optimize a single
high-performance policy, but instead to examine how behaviors emerge and evolve
across large populations due to natural competition and environmental
pressures. In an effort to discover how complex behaviors naturally emerge, we
conduct experiments in large-scale worlds that reach populations of more than
60,000 individual agents, each with their own evolved neural network policy. We
identify various emergent behaviors such as long-range resource extraction,
vision-based foraging, and predation that arise under competitive and survival
pressures. We examine how sensing modalities and environmental scale affect the
emergence of these behaviors, finding that some appear only in sufficiently
large environments and populations, with larger scales increasing behavioral
stability and consistency. While there is a rich history of research in
evolutionary settings, our scaling results provide promising new directions to
explore ecology as an instrument of machine learning in an era of abundant
computational resources. Experimental code is available at
https://github.com/jbejjani2022/ecological-emergent-behavior.

</details>


### [208] [From Agent Simulation to Social Simulator: A Comprehensive Review (Part 1)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18271)
*Xiao Xue,Deyu Zhou,Ming Zhang,Fei-Yue Wang*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: 本篇综述第一部分，主要介绍代理人基础模型（ABM）的历史发展和经典案例，包括其发展历史、设计原则、社会模拟的基金模型（个体模型、环境模型、规则模型）以及三种经典案例（思想实验、机制探索、并行优化）。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 阐述传统物理模拟方法在社科领域面临的挑战，引出ABM的必要性。

Method: 介绍ABM的发展历史、设计原则，详细介绍基础模型（个体模型、环境模型、规则模型），并展示社会模拟的经典案例（思想实验、机制探索、并行优化）。

Result: 通过介绍ABM的发展历程、核心概念和经典应用，为读者理解ABM提供基础。

Conclusion: ABM是模拟社会系统的重要方法，具有广泛的应用前景。

Abstract: This is the first part of the comprehensive review, focusing on the
historical development of Agent-Based Modeling (ABM) and its classic cases. It
begins by discussing the development history and design principles of
Agent-Based Modeling (ABM), helping readers understand the significant
challenges that traditional physical simulation methods face in the social
domain. Then, it provides a detailed introduction to foundational models for
simulating social systems, including individual models, environmental models,
and rule-based models. Finally, it presents classic cases of social simulation,
covering three types: thought experiments, mechanism exploration, and parallel
optimization.

</details>


### [209] [Socialized Learning and Emergent Behaviors in Multi-Agent Systems based on Multimodal Large Language Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18515)
*Sureyya Akin,Shruti T. Tiwari,Ram Bhattacharya,Sagar A. Raman,Kiran Mohanty,Sita Krishnan*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: M-S2L框架通过结合多模态大语言模型和社会学习机制，促进人工智能代理的社会智能发展，并在协作装配环境中取得优于基线模型的成果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了在多智能体系统中培养人工智能代理的社会智能，特别是促进它们之间的协作和交流能力。

Method: 提出并实现了一种名为M-S2L（Multimodal Socialized Learning Framework）的框架，该框架结合了多模态感知（视觉和文本）、结构化动作能力、直接强化学习、多模态观察学习、通信驱动学习以及情景记忆系统。

Result: 在协作装配环境中，M-S2L代理在任务完成率和完成时间方面显著优于仅文本和无社会学习的基线模型，特别是在处理模糊蓝图和信息不对称的复杂任务时。研究还观察到，M-S2L代理能够发展出高效的通信协议和角色专业化。

Conclusion: 将多模态感知与显式的社会学习相结合，对于在多智能体系统中开发类似人类的协作智能至关重要，并可能为机器社会认知奠定基础。

Abstract: This search introduces the Multimodal Socialized Learning Framework (M-S2L),
designed to foster emergent social intelligence in AI agents by integrating
Multimodal Large Language Models (M-LLMs) with social learning mechanisms. The
framework equips agents with multimodal perception (vision and text) and
structured action capabilities, enabling physical manipulation and grounded
multimodal communication (e.g., text with visual pointers). M-S2L combines
direct reinforcement learning with two novel social learning pathways:
multimodal observational learning and communication-driven learning from
feedback, augmented by an episodic memory system for long-term social context.
  We evaluate M-S2L in a Collaborative Assembly Environment (CAE), where agent
teams must construct complex devices from ambiguous blueprints under
informational asymmetry. Across tasks of increasing complexity, M-S2L agents
consistently outperform Text-Only and No-Social-Learning baselines in Task
Completion Rate and Time to Completion, particularly in dynamic problem-solving
scenarios. Ablation studies confirm the necessity of both multimodality and
socialized learning. Our analysis reveals the emergence of efficient
communication protocols integrating visual pointers with concise text,
alongside rapid role specialization leading to stable labor division.
Qualitative case studies demonstrate agents' abilities for shared awareness,
dynamic re-planning, and adaptive problem-solving, suggesting a nascent form of
machine social cognition. These findings indicate that integrating multimodal
perception with explicit social learning is critical for developing human-like
collaborative intelligence in multi-agent systems.

</details>


### [210] [Fetch.ai: An Architecture for Modern Multi-Agent Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18699)
*Michael J. Wooldridge,Attila Bagoly,Jonathan J. Ward,Emanuele La Malfa,Gabriel Paludo Licks*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: Fetch.ai架构整合了MAS和AI，利用区块链实现去中心化身份、发现和交易，并提供开发框架、云部署和LLM驱动的编排层，以构建安全、可互操作的代理系统，最终实现经济可持续的MAS生态系统。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前的大型语言模型（LLM）驱动的智能系统在很大程度上忽视了多代理系统（MAS）的研究基础，导致了中心化以及信任和通信协议不足等关键限制。

Method: 提出了Fetch.ai架构，一个基于去中心化区块链服务的底层，用于可验证的身份、发现和交易。该架构还包括一个用于创建安全、可互操作代理的开发框架、一个用于部署的云平台和一个智能编排层，其中代理原生的LLM将高级人类目标转化为复杂的多代理工作流。

Result: 在去中心化的物流用例中，展示了该系统的部署能力，其中自主代理可以动态地发现、协商和安全地进行交易。

Conclusion: Fetch.ai堆栈提供了一个原则性的架构，用于超越当前的代理实现，迈向开放、协作和经济可持续的多代理生态系统。

Abstract: Recent surges in LLM-driven intelligent systems largely overlook decades of
foundational multi-agent systems (MAS) research, resulting in frameworks with
critical limitations such as centralization and inadequate trust and
communication protocols. This paper introduces the Fetch.ai architecture, an
industrial-strength platform designed to bridge this gap by facilitating the
integration of classical MAS principles with modern AI capabilities. We present
a novel, multi-layered solution built on a decentralized foundation of on-chain
blockchain services for verifiable identity, discovery, and transactions. This
is complemented by a comprehensive development framework for creating secure,
interoperable agents, a cloud-based platform for deployment, and an intelligent
orchestration layer where an agent-native LLM translates high-level human goals
into complex, multi-agent workflows. We demonstrate the deployed nature of this
system through a decentralized logistics use case where autonomous agents
dynamically discover, negotiate, and transact with one another securely.
Ultimately, the Fetch.ai stack provides a principled architecture for moving
beyond current agent implementations towards open, collaborative, and
economically sustainable multi-agent ecosystems.

</details>


### [211] [Computational Foundations for Strategic Coopetition: Formalizing Interdependence and Complementarity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18802)
*Vik Pant,Eric Yu*

Main category: cs.MA

TL;DR: 本报告提出了一种计算框架，用于量化分析社会技术系统中的合作竞争（coopetition）现象，结合了i*模型和博弈论，并通过实验和三星-索尼S-LCD合资企业案例进行了验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有模型（如i*）在定性分析战略依赖性方面丰富，但在定量分析动态权衡方面不足；经典博弈论则缺乏情境丰富性。本报告旨在弥合这一差距。

Method: 1. 将i*模型中的依赖关系（depender-dependee-dependum）量化为依赖性系数。 2. 借鉴Brandenburger和Nalebuff的“增加值”概念，对互补性进行建模。 3. 结合结构依赖性和议价能力进行价值分配。 4. 提出一种将结构依赖性纳入纳什均衡的博弈论模型。

Result: 通过实验测试（包括功效和对数价值函数）和对三星-索尼S-LCD合资企业（2004-2011）的实证应用，验证了所提出方法的有效性。对数函数在实证拟合方面表现更优（验证得分45/60），而功效函数则具有理论上的易处理性。

Conclusion: 本报告为一项关于需求工程和多主体系统中战略合作竞争的研究计划奠定了基础，并为后续研究（如信任动态、团队生产和互惠机制）提供了理论支撑。

Abstract: Modern socio-technical systems are characterized by strategic coopetition
where actors simultaneously cooperate to create value and compete to capture
it. While conceptual modeling languages like i* provide rich qualitative
representations of strategic dependencies, they lack mechanisms for
quantitative analysis of dynamic trade-offs. Conversely, classical game theory
offers mathematical rigor but strips away contextual richness. This technical
report bridges this gap by developing computational foundations that formalize
two critical dimensions of coopetition: interdependence and complementarity. We
ground interdependence in i* structural dependency analysis, translating
depender-dependee-dependum relationships into quantitative interdependence
coefficients through a structured translation framework. We formalize
complementarity following Brandenburger and Nalebuff's Added Value concept,
modeling synergistic value creation with validated parameterization. We
integrate structural dependencies with bargaining power in value appropriation
and introduce a game-theoretic formulation where Nash Equilibrium incorporates
structural interdependence. Validation combines comprehensive experimental
testing across power and logarithmic value function specifications,
demonstrating functional form robustness, with empirical application to the
Samsung-Sony S-LCD joint venture (2004-2011), where logarithmic specifications
achieve superior empirical fit (validation score 45/60) while power functions
provide theoretical tractability. This technical report serves as the
foundational reference for a coordinated research program examining strategic
coopetition in requirements engineering and multi-agent systems, with companion
work addressing trust dynamics, team production, and reciprocity mechanisms.

</details>


<div id='cs.SI'></div>

# cs.SI [[Back]](#toc)

### [212] [Multiplex Networks Provide Structural Pathways for Social Contagion in Rural Social Networks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18280)
*Yongren Shi,Edo Airoldi,Nicholas A. Christakis*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 本篇论文引入了一个名为“网络扭矩”的新指标，用于量化不同社交网络层对社会传染的贡献度，并利用洪都拉斯农村社区的数据验证了该指标的有效性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 理解行为扩散和设计有效的基于网络的干预措施，因为人类社交网络是多重的，包含重叠的关系层，这些层具有不同的结构特性和人际动力学，并且会相互作用形成复杂的相互依赖的社会传染路径。

Method: 引入“网络扭矩”新指标，利用洪都拉斯110个农村社区的社会中心图数据，包含11种命名生成器和一项外源性干预实验，构建新的统计框架来评估特定网络层如何改变全局连通性并支持三种实验性引入的健康实践的传播。

Result: 研究表明，特定的关系类型（如亲密友谊）能够特别地促进非重叠的扩散路径，从而在乡村层面放大行为改变。例如，最亲密的朋友所支持的非冗余路径可以增加关于不当使用奶嘴喂养新生儿的正确知识的采纳率，并增强关于父亲参与产后护理的态度。

Conclusion: 非重叠的多重社会联系与传统组织社会系统中的社会传染和社会凝聚力相关。

Abstract: Human social networks are inherently multiplex, comprising overlapping layers
of relationships. Different layers may have distinct structural properties and
interpersonal dynamics, but also may interact to form complex interdependent
pathways for social contagion. This poses a fundamental problem in
understanding behavioral diffusion and in devising effective network-based
interventions. Here, we introduce a new conceptualization of how much each
network layer contributes to critical contagion pathways and quantify it using
a novel metric, network torque. We exploit data regarding sociocentric maps of
110 rural Honduran communities using a battery of 11 name generators and an
experiment involving an exogenous intervention. Using a novel statistical
framework, we assess the extent to which specific network layers alter global
connectivity and support the spread of three experimentally introduced health
practices. The results show that specific relationship types - such as close
friendships - particularly enable non-overlapping diffusion pathways,
amplifying behavioral change at the village level. For instance, non-redundant
pathways enabled by closest friends can increase the adoption of correct
knowledge about feeding newborns inappropriate chupones and enhance attitudes
regarding fathers' involvement in postpartum care. Non-overlapping multiplex
social ties are relevant to social contagion and social coherence in
traditionally organized social systems.

</details>

# cond-mat.mes-hall [[Back]](#toc)

### [213] [Interplay of Noise and Reservoir-induced Decoherence in Persistent Currents](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17982)
*Samudra Sur,Thierry Giamarchi*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在非平衡态下，通过Keldysh技术研究了具有随机噪声和费米子储库的紧束缚环中持续电流的衰减，发现了两种退相干机制，并提出了在冷原子实验中实现的可能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究在非平衡态下，随机噪声和费米子储库对紧束缚环中持续电流的影响，以理解相干性的衰减机制。

Method: 使用Keldysh技术计算电流，分析噪声强度和储库耦合强度的比值对退相干的影响，并用经典速率方程描述非平衡稳态。

Result: 发现持续电流呈现非单调行为，存在两种退相干机制。储库耦合引入了与耦合强度倒数相关的相干长度。另一种机制与噪声强度和储库耦合的比例有关。

Conclusion: 非平衡稳态的性质可以通过经典速率方程有效描述，并且该模型可能在冷原子实验中得到实现。

Abstract: Persistent current is a hallmark of quantum phase coherence. We study the
fate of the persistent current in a non-equilibrium setting, where a
tight-binding ring is subjected to stochastic disorder as well as a fermionic
reservoir attached to each site. We evaluate the current using Keldysh
technique and find that it exhibits non-monotonic behavior, suggesting two
distinct mechanisms of decoherence. While coupling to the reservoirs introduces
a coherence length scale given by the inverse of the coupling strength, the
other mechanism is more subtle and driven by the ratio of noise strength to
reservoir coupling. The interplay of noise and reservoir constitutes a purely
non-equilibrium steady state with a flatter distribution function that we
effectively describe using classical rate equations. We discuss possibilities
of realizing our findings in ultracold-atom experiments.

</details>


### [214] [Magnus Induced Magnetic Diode Effect in Skyrmion Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18001)
*J. C. Bellizotti Souza,C. J. O. Reichhardt,C. Reichhardt,A. Saxena*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章揭示了“磁二极管效应”，即反转磁场时载流子传输表现出不可逆响应，并提出了一种利用锯齿势通道实现该效应的方法，适用于自旋转移矩（STT）和自旋轨道矩（SOT）驱动，有望应用于新型斯格明子基器件。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究斯格明子的磁二极管效应，探索其在不同驱动方式（STT和SOT）和磁场下的行为，并提出一种利用不对称势实现该效应的几何结构。

Method: 在具有锯齿势通道的结构中，研究斯格明子在STT和SOT驱动下的运动响应，重点分析了磁场反转对速度的影响，并解释了马格努斯力在其中起到的作用。

Result: 文章发现在固定磁场下，两种驱动方式均无电流二极管效应；反转磁场时，STT驱动下斯格明子速度反向且绝对值改变，SOT驱动下速度方向不变但值减小（表现为负微分电导）；固定电流下，存在与外加磁场相关的不可逆斯格明子速度，类似于传统二极管效应。

Conclusion: 提出了一种可以实现磁场诱导的二极管效应的斯格明子传输几何结构，该结构可用于开发新型斯格明子基器件。

Abstract: We show that skyrmions can exhibit what we call a magnetic diode effect,
where there is a nonreciprocal response in the transport when the magnetic
field is reversed. This effect can be achieved for skyrmions moving in a
channel with a sawtooth potential on one side and a reversed sawtooth potential
on the other side. We consider the cases of both spin-transfer torque (STT) and
spin-orbit torque (SOT) driving. When the magnetic field is held fixed, the
velocity response of the skyrmion is the same for current applied in either
direction for both STT and SOT driving, so there is no current diode effect.
When the magnetic field is reversed, under STT driving the velocity of the
skyrmion reverses and its absolute value changes. Under SOT driving, the
velocity remains in the same direction but drops to a much lower value,
resulting in negative differential conductivity. For a fixed current, we find a
nonreciprocal skyrmion velocity as a function of positive and negative applied
fields, in analogy to the velocity-current curves observed in the usual diode
effect. The nonreciprocity is generated by the Magnus force, which causes
skyrmions to interact preferentially with one side of the channel. Since the
channel sides have opposite asymmetry, a positive magnetic field can cause the
skyrmion to interact with the "hard" asymmetry side of the channel, while a
negative magnetic field causes the skyrmion to interact with the easy asymmetry
side. This geometry could be used to create new kinds of magnetic-field-induced
diode effects that can be harnessed in new types of skyrmion-based devices.

</details>


### [215] [A Hall viscosity for skyrmion via magnon interaction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18092)
*Bom Soo Kim*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章从绝缘磁体中自旋扭结运动的德 GZ 相互作用中直接识别出霍尔粘度项，该相互作用破坏了对称性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 文章旨在识别绝缘磁体中自旋扭结运动的霍尔粘度项，并探讨其与德 GZ 相互作用（DMI）的关系，以及研究自旋扭结霍尔角对不同因素的依赖性。

Method: 通过对所有阶数的磁振子贡献进行时间平均，直接从德 GZ 相互作用中识别出霍尔粘度项。

Result: 霍尔粘度项与自旋扭结电荷成正比。自旋扭结霍尔角显著取决于自旋扭结形状、大小、交换与 DMI 参数的比率，而与吉尔伯特阻尼参数基本无关。相反电荷的自旋扭结霍尔角大小相同。

Conclusion: 文章提出了一个依赖于速度的霍尔粘度项的假设，以解释相反电荷的不对称霍尔角。

Abstract: We identify a Hall viscosity term directly from the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya
interaction (DMI), that breaks parity symmetry, in the skyrmion motion of
insulating magnets by time-averaging the magnon contribution to all orders. The
viscosity term is proportional to the skyrmion charge. Skyrmion Hall angle
shows significant dependence on the skyrmion shape and size, the ratio of
exchange over DMI parameters, while roughly independent of the Gilbert damping
parameter. The Hall angles have the same magnitude for opposite skyrmion
charges. We speculate a velocity-dependent Hall viscosity contribution to seek
asymmetric Hall angles for the opposite charges.

</details>


### [216] [Altermon: a magnetic-field-free parity protected qubit based on a narrow altermagnet Josephson junction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18145)
*Sakineh Vosoughi-nia,Michał P. Nowak*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Altermagnets, a new class of materials, enable magnetic-field-free superconducting circuits. This paper analyzes Josephson junctions based on $d$-wave altermagnets, distinguishing between $d_{x^2-y^2}$ and $d_{xy}$ symmetries. The $d_{x^2-y^2}$ symmetry leads to spin splitting, while $d_{xy}$ symmetry shows spin degeneracy and intermode hybridization. A transverse electric field can tune these systems to create a magnetic-field-free, parity-protected superconducting qubit named 'altermon.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to explore the potential of altermagnets for creating magnetic-field-free superconducting circuits and to theoretically investigate the Andreev bound state (ABS) spectrum in finite-width altermagnet-based Josephson junctions.

Method: The study employs theoretical analysis to examine the ABS spectrum of Josephson junctions incorporating $d$-wave altermagnets. It investigates how the specific $d$-wave symmetries ($d_{x^2-y^2}$ and $d_{xy}$) and geometric confinement influence the low-energy excitations. Additionally, it proposes using a transverse electric field to tune the system.

Result: The research distinguishes between two $d$-wave altermagnetic symmetries: $d_{x^2-y^2}$ order results in spin splitting of the ABS spectrum, while $d_{xy}$ order maintains spin degeneracy but shows splitting due to intermode hybridization. These unique spectral features are leveraged to propose a novel superconducting qubit.

Conclusion: The paper concludes that altermagnets offer a promising platform for developing magnetic-field-free superconducting devices. By exploiting the distinct properties of $d_{x^2-y^2}$ and $d_{xy}$ altermagnetic symmetries and applying a transverse electric field, a parity-protected superconducting qubit, termed 'altermon', can be realized, paving the way for new avenues in superconducting circuit engineering.

Abstract: Altermagnets provide a new route to engineer superconducting circuits without
magnetic fields. We theoretically study the Andreev bound state (ABS) spectrum
of a finite-width altrmagnet-based Josephson junction and show how the $d$-wave
altermagnetic symmetry and geometric confinement shape its low-energy
excitations. We find a clear distinction between the two $d$-wave symmetries:
$d_{x^2-y^2}$ order produces spin splitting, whereas $d_{xy}$ order preserves
spin degeneracy and exhibits splitting of the ABS spectrum induced by intermode
hybridization. Leveraging these novel features, we propose applying a
transverse electric field to tune the system and realize a magnetic-field-free,
parity-protected superconducting qubit that we call altermon.

</details>


### [217] [All-Electrical Self-Switching of van der Waals Chiral Antiferromagnet](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18272)
*Junlin Xiong,Jiawei Jiang,Yanwei Cui,Han Gao,Ji Zhou,Zijia Liu,KuiKui Zhang,Shaobo Cheng,Kehui Wu,Sang-Wook Cheong,Kai Chang,Zhongkai Liu,Hongxin Yang,Shi-Jun Liang,Bin Cheng,Feng Miao*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章展示了在零外加磁场下，通过电荷电流确定性地切换了CoTa3S6材料中的手征反铁磁序。该材料中的磁矩格点与非局域电子之间的强相互作用产生了手征自旋轨道矩和RKKY交换矩，从而实现了手征磁序的全电切换，为操纵反铁磁序提供了新的途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 反铁磁体因其可忽略的杂散场和超快动力学特性，在密度和速度方面有望用于自旋电子学应用。利用其作为自旋源和信息载体的双重功能，可以实现反铁磁序的全电自感应切换，这对于超小型自旋电子器件具有巨大潜力。然而，这方面的进展仍然有限。

Method: 通过温度依赖的角度分辨光电子能谱、扫描隧道显微镜和拓扑 Nernst 效应测量，研究了 CoTa3S6 材料中磁矩格点与非局域电子之间的相互作用。

Result: 实验证明，CoTa3S6 材料中的非局域-局域相互作用能够产生电流诱导的手征自旋轨道矩和 RKKY 交换矩，这些矩与局域磁矩相互作用，从而在 CoTa3S6 薄片中实现了手征磁序的全电切换。

Conclusion: 该研究为通过精确调控磁矩与非局域电子之间的协同相互作用来操纵反铁磁序提供了一个有前景的方向。

Abstract: Antiferromagnets have garnered significant attention due to their negligible
stray field and ultrafast magnetic dynamics, which are promising for
high-density and ultrafast spintronic applications. Their dual functionality as
both spin sources and information carriers could enable all-electrical
self-induced switching of antiferromagnetic order, offering great potential for
ultra-compact spintronic devices. However, related progress is still elusive.
Here, we report the deterministic switching of chiral antiferromagnetic orders
induced by charge current at zero external magnetic field in the van der Waals
(vdW) magnetically intercalated transition metal dichalcogenide CoTa3S6. This
system exhibits strong interactions between cobalt atom magnetic moment lattice
and itinerant electrons within the metallic layers, as demonstrated by
temperature-dependent angle-resolved photoemission, scanning tunneling
spectroscopy, and topological Nernst effect measurements. Notably, the
itinerant-localization interactions lead to current-induced chiral spin orbit
torques as well as Ruderman-Kittel-Kasuya-Yosida (RKKY) exchange torques that
interact with the localized magnetic moments, facilitating all-electrical
switching of the chiral magnetic order in the CoTa3S6 flake. Our work opens a
promising avenue for manipulating antiferromagnetic orders by delicately
engineering the synergistic interactions between magnetic moments and itinerant
electrons.

</details>


### [218] [Spin gaps in Transition Metal Dichalcogenide Nanoribbons with atomic Adsorbates](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18275)
*Joshua O. Aggrey,Leonard Bleiziffer,Frank Hagelberg*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本研究探索了锯齿型过渡金属二硫属化物纳米带（zTMDCNRs）的自旋输运特性，特别是边缘官能化的zTMDCNRs。研究了包含五个zWXY单元的系统（X, Y = S, Se；n = 0, 1, 2；A = H, B, C, N, O），并引入了Janus纳米带。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 识别用于最大化通过纳米带的电流自旋极化的原子吸附质和吸附条件。

Method: 结合使用密度泛函理论（DFT）和非平衡格林函数（NEGF）方法，并采用HSE交换-关联泛函，以确定自旋和电荷传输特性，并评估所选原子吸附质对几何、电子和磁性的影响。

Result: 提出了一个协议来评估吸附质性质和密度对纳米带自旋过滤能力的影响，发现在费米能量附近的自旋能隙可以有效预测电流自旋极化程度。研究了铁磁（FM）和反铁磁（AFM）序，并讨论了磁相对自旋输运特性的影响。发现了特定的纳米带系统具有自旋选择性的负微分电阻效应。

Conclusion: 本研究为理解和设计具有高自旋极化特性的zTMDCNRs器件提供了理论指导，特别是通过对边缘进行官能化和吸附质的调控。

Abstract: Edge-functionalized Transition Metal dichalcogenide nanoribbons of the zigzag
type (zTMDCNRs) are explored in terms of their spin transmission properties.
Specifically, systems of the type 5-zWXYNR + nA (X, Y = S, Se; n = 0, 1, 2; A =
H, B, C, N, O), involving five rows of a zWXY unit, are investigated as
transmission elements between semi-infinite electrodes, to identify atomic
adsorbates and adsorption conditions for maximizing the spin polarization of
current traversing the ribbons. Janus counterparts of these units, asymmetric
structures comprising a transition metal layer sandwiched by two different
chalcogen layers, are included in this study. In all cases considered, density
functional theory (DFT) modeling, involving the hybrid Heyd-Scuseria-Ernzerhof
(HSE) exchange-correlation functional, is combined with the non-equilibrium
Green's function (NEGF) approach to determine both spin and charge transport
properties. The effect of the selected atomic absorbates on the geometric,
electronic, and magnetic properties of 5-zWXYNR (X, Y = S, Se) is evaluated. A
protocol to assess the spin-filtering capacity of 5-zWXYNR + nad as a function
of the nature and the density of atomic adsorbates, is formulated in terms of
band structure analysis of the respective electrode units. Spin gaps emerging
close to the Fermi energy of the electrode are shown to provide an effective
predictor for the degree of current spin polarization achieved by any of the
transmission systems studied here. For any adsorbate configuration considered,
ferromagnetic (FM) as well as antiferromagnetic (AFM) ordering is examined, and
the impact of the magnetic phase on the spin transport properties is discussed.
A spin-selective negative differential resistance effect is identified for
specific nanoribbon systems.

</details>


### [219] [Semiconductor-Semimetal Transition in van der Waals Carbyne Crystals](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18482)
*Daniele Barettin,Stella V. Kavokina,Evgeny L. Ivchenko,Alexey V. Kavokin*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 单原子碳链（卡拜）晶体的电子和光学性质研究。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究碳链晶体的电子和光学性质，探索其半金属-半导体转变及其相关的奇异激子效应。

Method: 结合连续波和时间分辨光致发光光谱学进行实验研究，并采用三维紧束缚形式主义（以密度泛函理论为基准）进行理论计算。

Result: 理论预测当碳链长度约为42个原子时，会发生半金属-半导体相变，并出现双曲范霍夫奇点和奇异的双曲激子。实验证实了半导体相的存在，并观察到与双曲激子相关的共振特征，且激子振子强度随链长增加而减小。

Conclusion: 研究结果证实了双曲激子对碳链长度的敏感性，揭示了激子态向半导体-半金属转变的演化过程，并为碳链晶体的带隙工程提供了理论框架。

Abstract: Freestanding van der Waals crystals made of single-atom carbon chains
(carbynes) have been recently realized technologically. Here we investigate
their electronic and optical properties experimentally, by continuous-wave and
time-resolved photoluminescence spectroscopy, and theoretically. Employing a
fully three-dimensional tight-binding formalism benchmarked against density
functional theory calculations we predict the semimetal-semiconductor
transition to occur in van der Waals carbyne crystals composed by the chains of
about 42 atoms long. The semiconductor phase is characterized by a hyperbolic
van Hove singularity which gives rise to unconventional hyperbolic exciton
states. Experimentally, we access the semiconductor phase, where resonant
features associated with hyperbolic excitons are clearly visible. The exciton
oscillator strength is found to be strongly sensitive to the length of carbon
chains: our experiments show that it decreases with the increasing chain
length. This tendency, confirmed by the theoretical modeling, manifests the
evolution of the hyperbolic exciton state on the way to the
semiconductor-semimetal crossover. Our approach accounts for the actual
crystalline geometry, including alternating intra-chain hoppings and
inter-chain couplings. By fitting tight-binding dispersions to density
functional theory data we extract consistent parameters and establish a
comprehensive framework for the physics of carbyne crystals. This study paves
the way towards efficient band-gap engineering in ultimate one-dimensional
carbon crystals.

</details>


### [220] [Fibonacci-Engineered Spin and Charge Thermoelectrics in a Long Range Su-Schrieffer-Heeger Chain: A Pathway to Giant Figure of Merit](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18532)
*Ranjini Bhattacharya,Souvik Roy*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种新的扩展SSH模型自旋相关热电性能分析方法，并首次展示了如何利用其内在自旋过滤机制设计高效的自旋热电发电机。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究的动机是探索扩展SSH模型中的自旋过滤机制如何应用于自旋热电发电机，并研究斐波那契类型非周期性调制和可调谐的跳跃幅度对热电性能的影响。

Method: 通过引入斐波那契类型非周期性调制和包含最近邻及次近邻跳跃幅度（具有可调谐余弦依赖性），并结合电荷和自旋传输通道，对扩展SSH模型进行分析。

Result: 在精心优化的条件下，电荷和自旋传输通道的无量纲热电优值ZT均得到显著增强，其中自旋热电响应表现出独特的优势。

Conclusion: 该研究不仅加深了对非周期拓扑系统的理解，还为利用低维平台上的自旋基热电学奠定了基础框架，并为下一代热电材料和设备的设计开辟了新途径。

Abstract: In this work, we present a novel investigation into the spin-dependent
thermoelectric performance of an extended Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) model,
showcasing for the first time how its intrinsic spin filtration mechanism can
be strategically harnessed to function as an efficient spin thermoelectric
generator. By introducing a Fibonacci-type aperiodic modulation in the onsite
energies, we engineer a deterministic disorder that mimics realistic aperiodic
systems and profoundly influences transport characteristics. Furthermore, we
incorporate both nearest-neighbor (NN) and next-nearest-neighbor (NNN) hopping
amplitudes with tunable cosine dependencies, enabling us to meticulously
explore the intricate interplay between these hopping processes and its
implications on thermoelectric behavior. Our analysis reveals a remarkable
enhancement in the dimensionless thermoelectric figure of merit ZT for both
charge and spin transport channels, under carefully optimized conditions.
Notably, the spin thermoelectric response exhibits distinct advantages, opening
a new frontier in the design of next-generation thermoelectric materials and
devices. This qualitative study not only deepens our understanding of aperiodic
topological systems but also establish a foundational framework for exploiting
spin-based thermoelectricity in low-dimensional platforms.

</details>


### [221] [Hamiltonian learning quantum magnets with dynamical impurity tomography](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18613)
*Netta Karjalainen,Greta Lupi,Rouven Koch,Adolfo O. Fumega,Jose L. Lado*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 机器学习可从扫描光谱测量中学习量子多体自旋哈密顿量，即使存在噪声。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 从头开始构建纳米级工程自旋系统（如表面自旋和纳米石墨烯）是实现纠缠量子磁铁的灵活平台，但准确评估实验实现的量子多体哈密顿量仍然是一个重大挑战，因为很难区分解释多体激发的竞争项。

Method: 提出一种利用量子磁铁旁量子杂质诱导的空间分辨重构的多体激发，从扫描光谱测量中学习量子多体自旋哈密顿量的机器学习策略。

Result: 该算法能够预测长程海森堡交换相互作用、各向异性交换以及反对易 Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya 相互作用，即使在存在显著噪声的情况下也能进行预测。

Conclusion: 该方法将量子磁体中缺陷诱导的空间分辨动力学激发确立为理解量子自旋多体模型性质的有力策略。

Abstract: Nanoscale engineered spin systems, ranging from spins on surfaces to
nanographenes, provide flexible platforms to realize entangled quantum magnets
from a bottom up approach. However, assessing the quantum many-body Hamiltonian
realized in a specific experiment remains an exceptional open challenge, due to
the difficulty of disentangling competing terms accounting for the many-body
excitations. Here, we demonstrate a machine learning strategy to learn a
quantum many-body spin Hamiltonian from scanning spectroscopy measurements of
spin excitations. Our methodology leverages the spatially-resolved
reconstruction of the many-body excitations induced by depositing quantum
impurities next to the quantum magnet. We demonstrate that our algorithm allows
us to predict long-range Heisenberg exchange interactions, anisotropic
exchange, as well as antisymmetric Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction, including
in the presence of sizable noise. Our methodology establishes defect-induced
spatially-resolved dynamical excitations in quantum magnets as a powerful
strategy to understand the nature of quantum spin many-body models.

</details>


### [222] [Cavity modification of magnetoplasmon mode through coupling with intersubband polaritons](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18665)
*Lucy L. Hale,Daniele De Bernardis,Stephan Lempereur,Lianhe H. Li,A. Giles Davies,Edmund H. Linfield,Trevor Blaikie,Chris Deimert,Zbigniew R. Wasilewski,Iacopo Carusotto,Jean-Michel Manceau,Mathieu Jeannin,Raffaele Colombelli,Jérôme Faist,Giacomo Scalari*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 在强磁场下，研究了多模金属-绝缘体-金属（MIM）腔与二维电子气（2DEG）的耦合。TM模式与2DEG的带间跃迁发生强杂化，形成超强耦合下的极化激元模式，而TE模式则几乎保持纯粹的腔模式。磁场引起的磁等离激元激发同时与TM和TE模式耦合，表现出不同的耦合强度和空间场不均匀性。纯粹TE模式的强均匀性导致了标准的强耦合反劈裂，而具有不均匀性的极化激元TM模式则在光谱响应中激活了可观察的库仑效应，即非局域性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究的动机在于探索在强磁场下，多模MIM腔与2DEG的耦合行为，特别是研究腔模式与2DEG电子跃迁的相互作用，以及磁场对这种耦合的影响，旨在揭示超强耦合体系中库仑相互作用的新探测途径。

Method: 通过实验研究了强磁场下多模MIM腔与2DEG的耦合。TM腔模式与2DEG的带间跃迁杂化形成极化激元模式，TE模式则为纯粹的腔模式。同时，考虑了磁场引起的磁等离激元激发与这两种模式的耦合。通过分析光谱响应，研究了耦合强度、空间场不均匀性以及库仑效应对非局域性的影响。

Result: 实验观察到，在超强耦合下，TM模式与2DEG的带间跃迁形成极化激元模式，并表现出非局域性（库仑效应）。TE模式则表现出标准的强耦合反劈裂现象。磁等离激元激发与TM和TE模式的耦合强度和空间不均匀性不同，进一步影响了光谱响应。

Conclusion: 本实验成功展示了腔对2DEG响应的诱导调控，并提出了一种通过改变腔模式轮廓来探测超强耦合体系中库仑相互作用影响的新方法。研究结果揭示了在强磁场和超强耦合条件下，腔-物质相互作用的复杂性以及库仑效应在其中的重要作用。

Abstract: We investigate the coupling of a multi-mode metal-insulator-metal cavity to a
two-dimensional electron gas (2DEG) in a quantum well in the presence of a
strong magnetic field. The TM cavity mode is strongly hybridized with an
intersubband transition of the 2DEG, forming a polaritonic mode in the
ultrastrong coupling regime, while the TE mode remains an almost purely cavity
mode. The magnetoplasmon excitation emerging from the presence of the magnetic
field couples with both TM and TE modes, exhibiting different coupling
strengths and levels of spatial field inhomogeneity. While the strong
homogeneity of the bare TE mode gives rise to the standard anticrossing of
strong coupling, the inhomogeneous polaritonic TM mode is shown to activate an
observable Coulombic effect in the spectral response, often referred to as
non-locality. This experiment demonstrates a cavity-induced modification of the
2DEG response and offers a new route to probing the effect of Coulomb
interactions in ultrastrongly coupled systems via reshaping of their cavity
mode profiles.

</details>


### [223] [Geometric control of the moire twist angle in heterobilayer flakes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18694)
*Prathap Kumar Jharapla,Nicolas Leconte,Zhiren He,Guru Khalsa,Jeil Jung*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: The paper demonstrates a finite twist-angle stabilization mechanism in lattice-mismatched 2D heterobilayers, utilizing geometric alignment between flake edges and moire patterns to achieve precise twist-angle control.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The motivation is to demonstrate a twist-angle stabilization mechanism in 2D heterobilayers that are mismatched in their crystal lattice structure. This mechanism stems from the geometric alignment between the edges of the flakes and the moire pattern formed between them. The goal is to enable precise control over the twist angle in these heterostructures.

Method: Atomistic simulations were used to study graphene on hexagonal boron nitride flakes with diameters up to approximately 2500 angstroms. The simulations identified metastable twist angles and investigated how in-plane heterostrain can tune these angles.

Result: The simulations identified robust metastable twist angles: approximately 0.61 degrees for armchair-edged flakes and approximately 1.89 degrees for zigzag-edged flakes. These angles are tunable via in-plane heterostrain. The energy barriers associated with these locking angles are found to be an order of magnitude larger than those of nearby metastable twist angles.

Conclusion: The paper concludes that a geometric locking mechanism stabilizes finite twist angles in 2D heterobilayers. This mechanism, relying on energy barriers significantly larger than those of nearby angles, provides a method for precise twist-angle control in two-dimensional heterostructures and aids in understanding the self-orientation of macroscopic flakes.

Abstract: We demonstrate a finite twist-angle stabilization mechanism in
lattice-mismatched 2D heterobilayers, which results from the geometric
alignment between the flake edges and its moire pattern. Using atomistic
simulations of graphene on hexagonal boron nitride flakes with diameters of up
to $\sim 2500${\AA}, we identify robust metastable angles at $\sim 0.61^\circ$
for armchair and $\sim1.89^\circ$ for zigzag-edged flakes, tunable via in-plane
heterostrain. This locking mechanism, which relies on energy barriers that are
an order of magnitude larger than those of nearby metastable twist angles,
provides a geometric route to precision twist-angle control of two-dimensional
heterostructures and to understand the self-orientation of macroscopic flakes.

</details>


### [224] [Extinction Coefficients of CdSe, CdS, and CdTe Nanoplatelets in Solution: A Practical Tool for Concentration Determination](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18717)
*Michael H. Stewart,Michael W. Swift,Farwa Awan,Liam Burke,Christopher M. Green,Barbara A. Marcheschi,Igor L. Medintz,Todd D. Krauss,Alexander L. Efros*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过建立理论模型，实现了从吸收光谱中提取纳米片浓度和估算其横向尺寸，解决了传统方法耗时费力的问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 与量子点不同，半导体纳米片的吸收峰位置仅能反映厚度，无法确定其横向尺寸和浓度，给样品表征带来挑战，迫使研究者依赖耗时且昂贵的元素分析技术。

Method: 提出并验证了一个理论框架，用于预测随机取向的CdSe、CdS和CdTe纳米片的频率相关吸收系数。

Result: 研究表明，纳米片的积分吸收系数普遍取决于其表面积和厚度，为无需繁琐元素分析即可获得浓度信息提供了实用工具。

Conclusion: 该方法弥补了量子点和纳米片在表征上的差距，为纳米片的研究和应用提供了更快捷的样品分析途径。

Abstract: Semiconductor nanoplatelets possess exceptional optical properties that make
them promising candidates for next-generation optoelectronic applications.
However, unlike quantum dots where absorption spectroscopy alone can determine
both size and concentration, nanoplatelets present a significant
characterization challenge: the absorption peak position reveals only
thickness, providing no information about lateral dimensions or concentration.
This limitation forces researchers to rely on time-consuming and costly
elemental analysis techniques for complete sample characterization. Here, we
present an experimentally verified theoretical framework that predicts the
frequency-dependent absorption coefficient of randomly oriented CdSe, CdS, and
CdTe nanoplatelets, enabling concentration determination from absorption
measurements and lateral size estimates. Our model shows that the integrated
absorption coefficient depends universally on nanoplatelet surface area and
thickness, yielding a practical tool to extract concentrations without
laborious elemental analysis. This approach bridges the characterization gap
between quantum dots and nanoplatelets, offering a streamlined method for rapid
sample analysis that could accelerate nanoplatelet research and applications.

</details>


### [225] [Self-Consistent Model for Gate Control of Narrow-, Broken-, and Inverted-Gap (Topological) Heterostructures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18778)
*Maximilian Hofer,Christopher Fuchs,Moritz Siebert,Christian Berger,Lena Fürst,Martin Stehno,Steffen Schreyeck,Hartmut Buhmann,Tobias Kießling,Wouter Beugeling,Laurens W. Molenkamp*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 静电势可显著影响窄带隙材料的能带结构，需要自洽Hartree方法。传统的宽带隙方法在此类系统中失效。Andlauer和Vogl的全带包络函数方法及其在kdotpy中的实现，可以准确模拟HgTe量子阱的实验结果，并有望促进对此类材料的研究。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的宽带隙方法在处理窄带隙、破裂带隙和反转带隙材料时会失效，因为这些材料的价带和导带会发生强烈的杂化或交叉，导致难以区分电子和空穴，并且难以保证电荷中性点附近的载流子分布是平坦的。因此，需要一种替代方法来准确描述这些材料的能带结构。

Method: 采用Andlauer和Vogl的全带包络函数方法，并将其实现到开源软件kdotpy（arXiv:2407.12651）中。通过模拟不同厚度（26 nm - 110 nm）的拓扑反转HgTe量子阱在栅极电压下的实验亚带密度演化，来验证该方法的数值稳定性和定量准确性。

Result: 所提出的全带包络函数方法及其kdotpy实现，在传统方法失效的情况下，能够提供数值稳定且定量准确的结果。通过对HgTe量子阱的模拟，验证了该方法在复杂能带结构材料中的有效性。

Conclusion: Andlauer和Vogl的全带包络函数方法及其kdotpy实现，能够成功模拟传统方法无法处理的窄带隙、破裂带隙和反转带隙材料。该开源实现有望极大地推动对此类材料的研究。

Abstract: Even small electrostatic potentials can dramatically influence the band
structure of narrow-, broken-, and inverted-gap materials. A quantitative
understanding often necessitates a self-consistent Hartree approach. The
valence and conduction band states strongly hybridize and/or cross in these
systems. This makes distinguishing between electrons and holes impossible and
the assumption of a flat charge carrier distribution at the charge neutrality
point hard to justify. Consequently the wide-gap approach often fails in these
systems. An alternative is the full-band envelope-function approach by Andlauer
and Vogl, which has been implemented into the open-source software package
kdotpy (arXiv:2407.12651). We show that this approach and implementation gives
numerically stable and quantitatively accurate results where the conventional
method fails by modeling the experimental subband density evolution with
top-gate voltage in thick (26 nm - 110 nm), topologically inverted HgTe quantum
wells. We expect our openly-available implementation to greatly benefit the
investigation of narrow-, broken-, and inverted-gap materials.

</details>


### [226] [Fermi arcs for generic nodal points hosting monopoles or dipoles](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.18785)
*Ipsita Mandal*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 费米弧是三维拓扑半金属表面态，与真空边界处体的边界对应有关，其数量和性质反映了节点电荷的拓扑性质。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 阐述费米弧的性质，并分析其与节点电荷、能带色散的关系，以及在不同类型的拓扑节点下是否存在费米弧。

Method: 通过分析解析结构来表征费米弧的状态，并考虑了节点简并度和能带色散的多种情况。

Result: 提出了费米弧的解析结构表征方法，并讨论了零单极矩但具有理想偶极矩的拓扑节点是否存在费米弧。

Conclusion: 费米弧的性质与拓扑节点的电荷和能带色散密切相关，其存在和特征可以通过实验观测。

Abstract: Fermi arcs represent the surface states at the boundary of a
three-dimensional topological semimetal with the vacuum, illustrating the
notion of bulk-boundary correspondence playing out in real materials. Their
special character is tied up with the topological charges carried by the nodes
of the semimetal in the momentum space, where two or more bands cross. In fact,
they are constrained to begin and end on the perimeters of the projections of
the Fermi surfaces of the bands tangentially, signalling their mixing with the
bulk states. The number of Fermi arcs grazing onto the tangents of the
outermost projection about a given node also reflects the magnitude of the
charge at the node (equalling the Berry-curvature monopole), revealing the
intrinsic topology of the underlying bandstructure, which can be visualised in
experiments like ARPES. Here we take upon the task of unambiguously
characterising the analytical structure of these states for generic nodal
points, (1) whose degeneracy might be twofold or multifold; and (2) the
associated bands might exhibit isotropic or anisotropic, linear- or
nonlinear-in-momentum dispersion. Moreover, we also address the question of
whether we should get any Fermi arcs at all for topological nodes carrying zero
values of monopoles, but representing ideal dipoles.

</details>


<div id='eess.SP'></div>

# eess.SP [[Back]](#toc)

### [227] [Machine Learning-Based Performance Evaluation of a Solar-Powered Hydrogen Fuel Cell Hybrid in a Radio-Controlled Electric Vehicle](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.17808)
*Amirhesam Aghanouri,Mohamed Sabry,Joshua Cherian Varughese,Cristina Olaverri-Monreal*

Main category: eess.SP

TL;DR: 混合动力电动遥控赛车结合了镍氢电池和质子交换膜燃料电池系统，通过数据驱动分析提高了性能和可靠性，并为未来电动汽车和充电站规划提供了参考。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了提高混合动力电动汽车的性能和可靠性，并为未来更大规模的应用提供参考。

Method: 采用数据驱动分析，结合信号处理和机器学习技术，包括识别油门级别、异常检测、变化点检测和时间卷积网络来预测电压行为。

Result: 所提出的混合系统显著提高了电气性能和可靠性，能够有效检测和预防故障。时间卷积网络能够准确预测电压行为。集成了太阳能电解槽，证明了离网运行的可行性。

Conclusion: 将质子交换膜燃料电池与镍氢电池集成可以显著提高小型电动汽车的电气性能和可靠性，为扩大到更大型号的车辆提供了潜在的基础。

Abstract: This paper presents an experimental investigation and performance evaluation
of a hybrid electric radio-controlled car powered by a Nickel-Metal Hydride
battery combined with a renewable Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cell system.
The study evaluates the performance of the system under various load-carrying
scenarios and varying environmental conditions, simulating real-world operating
conditions including throttle operation. In order to build a predictive model,
gather operational insights, and detect anomalies, data-driven analyses using
signal processing and modern machine learning techniques were employed.
Specifically, machine learning techniques were used to distinguish throttle
levels with high precision based on the operational data. Anomaly and change
